    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (role_id) REFERENCES roles(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (permission_id) REFERENCES permissions(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    
    UNIQUE KEY unique_role_permission (role_id, permission_id)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 6: user_addresses (Customer shipping/billing addresses)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
CREATE TABLE user_addresses (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    
    -- Address Type
    address_type ENUM('shipping', 'billing', 'both') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'shipping',
    
    -- Address Details
    full_name VARCHAR(150) NOT NULL,
    phone VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    
    address_line1 VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    address_line2 VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    city VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    state VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    postal_code VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    country VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    country_code VARCHAR(2) NOT NULL, -- ISO 3166-1 alpha-2
    
    -- Flags
    is_default BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    
    INDEX idx_user_id (user_id),
    INDEX idx_address_type (address_type),
    INDEX idx_country_code (country_code)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 7: password_resets (Password reset tokens)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE password_resets (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    token VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    expires_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    
    INDEX idx_email (email),
    INDEX idx_token (token)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 8: user_sessions (Active user sessions)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE user_sessions (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    
    session_token VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    ip_address VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
    user_agent TEXT NULL,
    
    device_type VARCHAR(50) NULL, -- desktop, mobile, tablet
    browser VARCHAR(100) NULL,
    os VARCHAR(100) NULL,
    
    last_activity TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    expires_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    
    INDEX idx_user_id (user_id),
    INDEX idx_session_token (session_token),
    INDEX idx_expires_at (expires_at)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


SECTION 2: VENDOR-SPECIFIC TABLES


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 9: vendors (Vendor/Seller profiles)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE vendors (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    
    -- Store Information
    store_name VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    store_slug VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    store_description TEXT NULL,
    store_tagline VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    
    -- Contact Information
    store_email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    store_phone VARCHAR(20) NULL,
    
    -- Address
    address_line1 VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    address_line2 VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    city VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    state VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    postal_code VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    country VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    
    -- Branding
    logo_url VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    banner_url VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    favicon_url VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    primary_color VARCHAR(7) DEFAULT '#3B82F6',
    secondary_color VARCHAR(7) DEFAULT '#10B981',
    
    -- Business Details
    business_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    business_type ENUM('sole_proprietor', 'llc', 'corporation', 'partnership') NOT NULL,
    tax_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    registration_number VARCHAR(100) NULL,
    
    -- License & Documents
    business_license_url VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    license_expiry_date DATE NULL,
    tax_certificate_url VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    
    -- Commission
    commission_rate DECIMAL(5, 2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 15.00, -- Percentage
    
    -- Status & Verification
    status ENUM('pending', 'approved', 'rejected', 'suspended') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
    verified BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    verified_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    
    -- Social Media
    website_url VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    facebook_url VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    instagram_url VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    twitter_url VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    
    -- Statistics (Denormalized for performance)
    total_products INT UNSIGNED DEFAULT 0,
    total_sales DECIMAL(15, 2) DEFAULT 0.00,
    total_orders INT UNSIGNED DEFAULT 0,
    average_rating DECIMAL(3, 2) DEFAULT 0.00,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    
    INDEX idx_user_id (user_id),
    INDEX idx_store_slug (store_slug),
    INDEX idx_status (status),
    INDEX idx_verified (verified)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 10: vendor_bank_accounts (Vendor payout information)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE vendor_bank_accounts (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    
    -- Bank Details
    account_holder_name VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
    bank_name VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
    account_number VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, -- Encrypted
    routing_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, -- Encrypted
    account_type ENUM('checking', 'savings') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'checking',
    
    -- Swift/IBAN for international
    swift_code VARCHAR(20) NULL,
    iban VARCHAR(50) NULL,
    
    -- Verification
    is_verified BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    verified_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    
    is_default BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES vendors(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    
    INDEX idx_vendor_id (vendor_id)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 11: vendor_payouts (Payout history)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
CREATE TABLE vendor_payouts (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    bank_account_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL,
    
    -- Payout Details
    payout_reference VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    
    gross_amount DECIMAL(15, 2) NOT NULL,
    commission_amount DECIMAL(15, 2) NOT NULL,
    gateway_fee DECIMAL(15, 2) DEFAULT 0.00,
    adjustments DECIMAL(15, 2) DEFAULT 0.00,
    net_amount DECIMAL(15, 2) NOT NULL,
    
    -- Period
    period_from DATE NOT NULL,
    period_to DATE NOT NULL,
    
    -- Status
    status ENUM('pending', 'processing', 'completed', 'failed', 'cancelled') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
    
    -- Payment Method
    payment_method ENUM('bank_transfer', 'paypal', 'stripe') NOT NULL,
    transaction_id VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    
    -- Dates
    requested_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    processed_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    completed_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    
    notes TEXT NULL,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES vendors(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (bank_account_id) REFERENCES vendor_bank_accounts(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
    
    INDEX idx_vendor_id (vendor_id),
    INDEX idx_status (status),
    INDEX idx_payout_reference (payout_reference),
    INDEX idx_period (period_from, period_to)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


SECTION 3: PRODUCT CATALOG TABLES


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 12: categories (Product categories - Hierarchical)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE categories (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    parent_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL,
    
    name VARCHAR(150) NOT NULL,
    slug VARCHAR(150) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    description TEXT NULL,
    
    -- Display
    icon VARCHAR(100) NULL, -- Icon class or emoji
    image_url VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    
    -- Ordering
    display_order INT DEFAULT 0,
    
    -- SEO
    meta_title VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    meta_description TEXT NULL,
    
    -- Status
    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
    
    -- Counts (Denormalized)
    product_count INT UNSIGNED DEFAULT 0,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (parent_id) REFERENCES categories(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    
    INDEX idx_parent_id (parent_id),
    INDEX idx_slug (slug),
    INDEX idx_is_active (is_active),
    INDEX idx_display_order (display_order)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 13: attributes (Product attributes - Color, Size, etc.)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE attributes (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    
    name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    slug VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    
    -- Type
    type ENUM('text', 'dropdown', 'multiselect', 'color', 'radio') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'dropdown',
    
    -- Display
    display_order INT DEFAULT 0,
    
    -- Scope
    is_global BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE, -- Global or category-specific
    is_visible BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE, -- Show on product page
    is_filterable BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE, -- Use in filters
    is_required BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    INDEX idx_slug (slug),
    INDEX idx_is_global (is_global)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 14: attribute_values (Values for attributes)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE attribute_values (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    attribute_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    
    value VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
    display_value VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL, -- For display (e.g., "Extra Large" for "XL")
    color_code VARCHAR(7) NULL, -- For color attributes
    
    display_order INT DEFAULT 0,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (attribute_id) REFERENCES attributes(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    
    INDEX idx_attribute_id (attribute_id),
    UNIQUE KEY unique_attribute_value (attribute_id, value)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 15: category_attributes (Link categories to required attributes)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE category_attributes (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    category_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    attribute_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    
    is_required BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    display_order INT DEFAULT 0,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES categories(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (attribute_id) REFERENCES attributes(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    
    UNIQUE KEY unique_category_attribute (category_id, attribute_id)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 16: products (Main product table)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE products (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    category_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    
    -- Basic Info
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    slug VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    short_description VARCHAR(500) NULL,
    description LONGTEXT NULL,
    
    -- SKU & Identifiers
    sku VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    barcode VARCHAR(100) NULL,
    
    -- Pricing
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    sale_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NULL,
    cost_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NULL, -- For vendor reference
    
    -- Sale Period
    sale_start_date TIMESTAMP NULL,
    sale_end_date TIMESTAMP NULL,
    
    -- Inventory
    stock_quantity INT DEFAULT 0,
    low_stock_threshold INT DEFAULT 10,
    track_inventory BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
    allow_backorders BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    
    -- Physical Properties
    weight DECIMAL(8, 2) NULL, -- kg
    length DECIMAL(8, 2) NULL, -- cm
    width DECIMAL(8, 2) NULL,
    height DECIMAL(8, 2) NULL,
    
    -- Shipping
    requires_shipping BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
    shipping_class VARCHAR(50) NULL,
    
    -- Tax
    tax_class VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'standard',
    
    -- SEO
    meta_title VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    meta_description TEXT NULL,
    
    -- Product Type
    type ENUM('simple', 'variable', 'digital') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'simple',
    
    -- Status & Visibility
    status ENUM('draft', 'pending', 'approved', 'published', 'rejected') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'draft',
    visibility ENUM('public', 'private', 'hidden') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'public',
    
    -- Features
    is_featured BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    allow_reviews BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
    
    -- Statistics (Denormalized)
    view_count INT UNSIGNED DEFAULT 0,
    sale_count INT UNSIGNED DEFAULT 0,
    rating_average DECIMAL(3, 2) DEFAULT 0.00,
    rating_count INT UNSIGNED DEFAULT 0,
    
    -- Dates
    published_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    deleted_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES vendors(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES categories(id),
    
    INDEX idx_vendor_id (vendor_id),
    INDEX idx_category_id (category_id),
    INDEX idx_sku (sku),
    INDEX idx_slug (slug),
    INDEX idx_status (status),
    INDEX idx_type (type),
    INDEX idx_is_featured (is_featured),
    INDEX idx_price (price),
    INDEX idx_created_at (created_at),
    
    FULLTEXT INDEX ft_search (name, description)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 17: product_images (Product photos)
-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE product_images (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    
    image_url VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    thumbnail_url VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    alt_text VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    
    is_primary BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    display_order INT DEFAULT 0,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    
    INDEX idx_product_id (product_id),
    INDEX idx_is_primary (is_primary)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 18: product_variants (Product variations - Size, Color combos)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE product_variants (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    
    -- Variant Details
    sku VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    variant_name VARCHAR(255) NULL, -- E.g., "Large - Blue"
    
    -- Pricing (can override parent)
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NULL,
    sale_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NULL,
    
    -- Inventory
    stock_quantity INT DEFAULT 0,
    
    -- Physical (can override parent)
    weight DECIMAL(8, 2) NULL,
    
    -- Image (variant-specific)
    image_url VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    
    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    
    INDEX idx_product_id (product_id),
    INDEX idx_sku (sku)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 19: product_variant_attributes (Variant attribute values)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE product_variant_attributes (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    variant_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    attribute_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    attribute_value_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (variant_id) REFERENCES product_variants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (attribute_id) REFERENCES attributes(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (attribute_value_id) REFERENCES attribute_values(id),
    
    UNIQUE KEY unique_variant_attribute (variant_id, attribute_id)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 20: product_attributes (Simple product attributes)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE product_attributes (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    attribute_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    attribute_value_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL,
    custom_value TEXT NULL, -- For free-text attributes
    
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (attribute_id) REFERENCES attributes(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (attribute_value_id) REFERENCES attribute_values(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
    
    INDEX idx_product_id (product_id),
    UNIQUE KEY unique_product_attribute (product_id, attribute_id)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


SECTION 4: ORDERS & TRANSACTIONS TABLES


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 21: orders (Main orders table)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE orders (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    
    -- Order Identification
    order_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    
    -- Customer
    user_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL, -- NULL for guest checkout
    guest_email VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    
    -- Addresses
    shipping_address_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL,
    billing_address_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL,
    
    -- Order Amounts
    subtotal DECIMAL(15, 2) NOT NULL,
    discount_amount DECIMAL(15, 2) DEFAULT 0.00,
    shipping_amount DECIMAL(15, 2) DEFAULT 0.00,
    tax_amount DECIMAL(15, 2) DEFAULT 0.00,
    total_amount DECIMAL(15, 2) NOT NULL,
    
    -- Currency
    currency VARCHAR(3) DEFAULT 'USD',
    exchange_rate DECIMAL(10, 4) DEFAULT 1.0000,
    
    -- Coupon/Discount
    coupon_code VARCHAR(50) NULL,
    coupon_discount DECIMAL(15, 2) DEFAULT 0.00,
    
    -- Order Status
    status ENUM(
        'pending',
        'processing',
        'on_hold',
        'shipped',
        'delivered',
        'cancelled',
        'refunded',
        'failed'
    ) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
    
    -- Payment Status
    payment_status ENUM(
        'pending',
        'paid',
        'failed',
        'refunded',
        'partially_refunded'
    ) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
    
    -- Fulfillment Status
    fulfillment_status ENUM(
        'unfulfilled',
        'partially_fulfilled',
        'fulfilled'
    ) DEFAULT 'unfulfilled',
    
    -- Payment Details
    payment_method VARCHAR(50) NULL, -- stripe, paypal, cod, etc.
    payment_gateway VARCHAR(50) NULL,
    transaction_id VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    
    -- Customer Info
    customer_ip VARCHAR(45) NULL,
    customer_user_agent TEXT NULL,
    
    -- Notes
    customer_note TEXT NULL,
    admin_note TEXT NULL,
    
    -- Timestamps
    paid_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    shipped_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    delivered_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    cancelled_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (shipping_address_id) REFERENCES order_addresses(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (billing_address_id) REFERENCES order_addresses(id),
    
    INDEX idx_order_number (order_number),
    INDEX idx_user_id (user_id),
    INDEX idx_status (status),
    INDEX idx_payment_status (payment_status),
    INDEX idx_created_at (created_at),
    INDEX idx_guest_email (guest_email)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 22: order_addresses (Snapshot of addresses at order time)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE order_addresses (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    
    full_name VARCHAR(150) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    phone VARCHAR(20) NULL,
    
    address_line1 VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    address_line2 VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    city VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    state VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    postal_code VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    country VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    country_code VARCHAR(2) NOT NULL,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 23: order_items (Products in each order)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE order_items (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    
    -- Product Info (Snapshot at time of order)
    product_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL, -- Can be NULL if product deleted
    variant_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL,
    vendor_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    
    product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    product_sku VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    variant_name VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    
    -- Pricing (Snapshot)
    unit_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    subtotal DECIMAL(15, 2) NOT NULL,
    discount DECIMAL(15, 2) DEFAULT 0.00,
    tax DECIMAL(15, 2) DEFAULT 0.00,
    total DECIMAL(15, 2) NOT NULL,
    
    -- Commission
    commission_rate DECIMAL(5, 2) NOT NULL,
    commission_amount DECIMAL(15, 2) NOT NULL,
    vendor_earnings DECIMAL(15, 2) NOT NULL,
    
    -- Product Details (Snapshot)
    product_image_url VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    product_attributes JSON NULL, -- Store variant attributes
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES orders(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (variant_id) REFERENCES product_variants(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES vendors(id),
    
    INDEX idx_order_id (order_id),
    INDEX idx_product_id (product_id),
    INDEX idx_vendor_id (vendor_id)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 24: order_status_history (Order status change log) ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE order_status_history (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    
    old_status VARCHAR(50) NULL,
    new_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    
    comment TEXT NULL,
    
    changed_by BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL, -- User who made the change
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES orders(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (changed_by) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
    
    INDEX idx_order_id (order_id),
    INDEX idx_created_at (created_at)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 25: order_notes (Internal notes on orders) ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE order_notes (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    
    note TEXT NOT NULL,
    
    is_customer_note BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, -- Visible to customer?
    
    created_by BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES orders(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (created_by) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    
    INDEX idx_order_id (order_id)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 26: refunds (Order refunds)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE refunds (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    
    refund_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    
    refund_amount DECIMAL(15, 2) NOT NULL,
    
    reason ENUM(
        'customer_request',
        'defective_product',
        'wrong_item',
        'not_as_described',
        'late_delivery',
        'other'
    ) NOT NULL,
    reason_details TEXT NULL,
    
    status ENUM('pending', 'approved', 'rejected', 'processed') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
    
    -- Refund method
    refund_method ENUM('original_payment', 'store_credit', 'bank_transfer') NOT NULL,
    
    -- Processing
    processed_by BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL,
    processed_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    
    transaction_id VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES orders(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (processed_by) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
    
    INDEX idx_order_id (order_id),
    INDEX idx_status (status),
    INDEX idx_refund_number (refund_number)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 27: refund_items (Items being refunded)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE refund_items (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    refund_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    order_item_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    
    quantity INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    refund_amount DECIMAL(15, 2) NOT NULL,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (refund_id) REFERENCES refunds(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (order_item_id) REFERENCES order_items(id),
    
    INDEX idx_refund_id (refund_id)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 28: transactions (Payment transactions)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE transactions (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL,
    
    transaction_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    
    type ENUM('payment', 'refund', 'chargeback') NOT NULL,
    
    amount DECIMAL(15, 2) NOT NULL,
    currency VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'USD',
    
    -- Gateway details
    payment_gateway VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, -- stripe, paypal, etc.
    gateway_response JSON NULL,
    
    status ENUM('pending', 'success', 'failed', 'cancelled') NOT NULL,
    
    -- Error handling
    error_code VARCHAR(50) NULL,
    error_message TEXT NULL,
    
    -- Timestamps
    processed_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES orders(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
    
    INDEX idx_order_id (order_id),
    INDEX idx_transaction_id (transaction_id),
    INDEX idx_status (status),
    INDEX idx_payment_gateway (payment_gateway)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 29: abandoned_carts (Track abandoned shopping carts)
-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE abandoned_carts (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    
    user_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL,
    session_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    
    email VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    
    -- Cart data
    cart_data JSON NOT NULL, -- Store entire cart
    
    total_amount DECIMAL(15, 2) NOT NULL,
    
    -- Recovery
    recovered BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    recovered_order_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL,
    recovered_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    
    -- Reminders sent
    reminder_sent_count INT UNSIGNED DEFAULT 0,
    last_reminder_sent_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    
    -- Timestamps
    abandoned_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (recovered_order_id) REFERENCES orders(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
    
    INDEX idx_user_id (user_id),
    INDEX idx_session_id (session_id),
    INDEX idx_email (email),
    INDEX idx_recovered (recovered),
    INDEX idx_abandoned_at (abandoned_at)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 30: wishlists (Customer wishlists)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE wishlists (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    product_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    variant_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL,
    
    added_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (variant_id) REFERENCES product_variants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    
    UNIQUE KEY unique_wishlist_item (user_id, product_id, variant_id),
    INDEX idx_user_id (user_id),
    INDEX idx_product_id (product_id)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


SECTION 5: INVENTORY & STOCK MANAGEMENT


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 31: inventory_logs (Stock movement history) ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE inventory_logs (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    
    product_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    variant_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL,
    
    -- Movement
    type ENUM(
        'purchase',      -- Added stock
        'sale',          -- Sold
        'return',        -- Customer return
        'damage',        -- Damaged goods
        'theft',         -- Stolen
        'adjustment',    -- Manual adjustment
        'transfer'       -- Transfer between locations
    ) NOT NULL,
    
    quantity_before INT NOT NULL,
    quantity_change INT NOT NULL, -- Can be positive or negative
    quantity_after INT NOT NULL,
    
    -- Reference
    reference_type VARCHAR(50) NULL, -- order, purchase_order, manual, etc.
    reference_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL,
    
    notes TEXT NULL,
    
    created_by BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (variant_id) REFERENCES product_variants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (created_by) REFERENCES users(id),
    
    INDEX idx_product_id (product_id),
    INDEX idx_variant_id (variant_id),
    INDEX idx_type (type),
    INDEX idx_created_at (created_at)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 32: stock_alerts (Low stock notifications) ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE stock_alerts (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    
    product_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    variant_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL,
    
    alert_type ENUM('low_stock', 'out_of_stock', 'overstock') NOT NULL,
    
    current_quantity INT NOT NULL,
    threshold_quantity INT NOT NULL,
    
    is_resolved BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    resolved_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (variant_id) REFERENCES product_variants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    
    INDEX idx_product_id (product_id),
    INDEX idx_alert_type (alert_type),
    INDEX idx_is_resolved (is_resolved)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 33: warehouses (Warehouse/storage locations - Optional)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE warehouses (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    
    name VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
    code VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    
    -- Address
    address_line1 VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    address_line2 VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    city VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    state VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    postal_code VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    country VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    
    -- Contact
    contact_person VARCHAR(150) NULL,
    phone VARCHAR(20) NULL,
    email VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    
    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
    is_primary BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES vendors(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    
    INDEX idx_vendor_id (vendor_id),
    INDEX idx_code (code)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 34: warehouse_inventory (Stock per warehouse)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE warehouse_inventory (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    
    warehouse_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    product_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    variant_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL,
    
    quantity INT DEFAULT 0,
    reserved_quantity INT DEFAULT 0, -- For pending orders
    available_quantity INT GENERATED ALWAYS AS (quantity - reserved_quantity) STORED,
    
    last_counted_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (warehouse_id) REFERENCES warehouses(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (variant_id) REFERENCES product_variants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    
    UNIQUE KEY unique_warehouse_product (warehouse_id, product_id, variant_id),
    INDEX idx_product_id (product_id)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 35: inventory_reservations (Reserved stock for pending orders)
-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE inventory_reservations (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    
    order_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    order_item_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    product_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    variant_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL,
    
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    
    status ENUM('reserved', 'released', 'fulfilled') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'reserved',
    
    expires_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, -- Auto-release after X hours
    released_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES orders(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (order_item_id) REFERENCES order_items(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (variant_id) REFERENCES product_variants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    
    INDEX idx_order_id (order_id),
    INDEX idx_product_id (product_id),
    INDEX idx_status (status),
    INDEX idx_expires_at (expires_at)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 36: stock_transfers (Transfer between warehouses)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE stock_transfers (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    
    transfer_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    
    from_warehouse_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    to_warehouse_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    
    product_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    variant_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL,
    
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    
    status ENUM('pending', 'in_transit', 'completed', 'cancelled') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
    
    notes TEXT NULL,
    
    transferred_by BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    received_by BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL,
    
    transferred_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    received_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (from_warehouse_id) REFERENCES warehouses(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (to_warehouse_id) REFERENCES warehouses(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (variant_id) REFERENCES product_variants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (transferred_by) REFERENCES users(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (received_by) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
    
    INDEX idx_from_warehouse (from_warehouse_id),
    INDEX idx_to_warehouse (to_warehouse_id),
    INDEX idx_status (status)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


SECTION 6: SHIPPING & FULFILLMENT


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 37: shipping_zones (Shipping regions)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE shipping_zones (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL, -- NULL for platform-wide
    
    name VARCHAR(150) NOT NULL,
    
    -- Countries/Regions in this zone
    countries JSON NOT NULL, -- Array of country codes
    
    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES vendors(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    
    INDEX idx_vendor_id (vendor_id)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 38: shipping_methods (Shipping options per zone)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE shipping_methods (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    shipping_zone_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    
    name VARCHAR(150) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT NULL,
    
    -- Rate calculation
    rate_type ENUM('flat_rate', 'weight_based', 'price_based', 'free') NOT NULL,
    
    -- Flat rate
    flat_rate DECIMAL(10, 2) NULL,
    
    -- Weight-based (per kg)
    rate_per_kg DECIMAL(10, 2) NULL,
    
    -- Price-based (percentage of cart)
    rate_percentage DECIMAL(5, 2) NULL,
    
    -- Free shipping threshold
    free_shipping_threshold DECIMAL(10, 2) NULL,
    
    -- Delivery time
    min_delivery_days INT NULL,
    max_delivery_days INT NULL,
    
    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
    display_order INT DEFAULT 0,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (shipping_zone_id) REFERENCES shipping_zones(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    
    INDEX idx_shipping_zone_id (shipping_zone_id)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 39: shipments (Order shipment tracking)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE shipments (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    
    shipment_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    
    -- Carrier info
    carrier VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, -- FedEx, UPS, USPS, etc.
    tracking_number VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    tracking_url VARCHAR(500) NULL,
    
    -- Shipping method
    shipping_method VARCHAR(150) NULL,
    
    -- Status
    status ENUM(
        'pending',
        'processing',
        'shipped',
        'in_transit',
        'out_for_delivery',
        'delivered',
        'failed',
        'returned'
    ) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
    
    -- Weight & Dimensions
    weight DECIMAL(8, 2) NULL,
    length DECIMAL(8, 2) NULL,
    width DECIMAL(8, 2) NULL,
    height DECIMAL(8, 2) NULL,
    
    -- Shipping cost
    shipping_cost DECIMAL(10, 2) NULL,
    
    -- Dates
    shipped_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    estimated_delivery TIMESTAMP NULL,
    delivered_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    
    notes TEXT NULL,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES orders(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    
    INDEX idx_order_id (order_id),
    INDEX idx_shipment_number (shipment_number),
    INDEX idx_tracking_number (tracking_number),
    INDEX idx_status (status)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 40: shipment_items (Items in shipment)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE shipment_items (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    shipment_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    order_item_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    
    quantity INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (shipment_id) REFERENCES shipments(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (order_item_id) REFERENCES order_items(id),
    
    INDEX idx_shipment_id (shipment_id)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 41: shipment_tracking_events (Shipment status updates)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE shipment_tracking_events (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    shipment_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    
    status VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT NULL,
    
    location VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    
    event_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (shipment_id) REFERENCES shipments(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    
    INDEX idx_shipment_id (shipment_id),
    INDEX idx_event_time (event_time)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


SECTION 7: REVIEWS & RATINGS


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 42: reviews (Product reviews)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE reviews (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    
    product_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    user_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    order_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL, -- For verified purchase
    
    -- Rating
    rating TINYINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, -- 1-5
    
    -- Review content
    title VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    review_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    
    -- Verification
    is_verified_purchase BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    
    -- Status
    status ENUM('pending', 'approved', 'rejected', 'spam') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'approved',
    
    -- Helpfulness
    helpful_count INT UNSIGNED DEFAULT 0,
    unhelpful_count INT UNSIGNED DEFAULT 0,
    
    -- Vendor response
    has_vendor_response BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    
    -- Dates
    reviewed_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES orders(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
    
    INDEX idx_product_id (product_id),
    INDEX idx_user_id (user_id),
    INDEX idx_status (status),
    INDEX idx_rating (rating),
    INDEX idx_reviewed_at (reviewed_at)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 43: review_images (Photos attached to reviews)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE review_images (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    review_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    
    image_url VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    thumbnail_url VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    
    display_order INT DEFAULT 0,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (review_id) REFERENCES reviews(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    
    INDEX idx_review_id (review_id)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 44: review_responses (Vendor responses to reviews)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE review_responses (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    review_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    
    response_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    
    responder_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, -- Vendor user
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (review_id) REFERENCES reviews(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (responder_id) REFERENCES users(id),
    
    INDEX idx_review_id (review_id)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 45: review_votes (Helpful/Unhelpful votes)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE review_votes (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    review_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    user_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    
    vote ENUM('helpful', 'unhelpful') NOT NULL,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (review_id) REFERENCES reviews(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    
    UNIQUE KEY unique_review_vote (review_id, user_id),
    INDEX idx_review_id (review_id)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


SECTION 8: MARKETING & PROMOTIONS


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 46: coupons (Discount coupons)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE coupons (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL, -- NULL for platform-wide
    
    -- Coupon details
    code VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    name VARCHAR(150) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT NULL,
    
    -- Discount type
    discount_type ENUM('percentage', 'fixed_amount', 'free_shipping', 'bogo') NOT NULL,
    
    -- Discount value
    discount_value DECIMAL(10, 2) NULL, -- Percentage or fixed amount
    max_discount_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NULL, -- Cap for percentage discounts
    
    -- Usage restrictions
    min_order_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NULL,
    max_uses INT UNSIGNED NULL, -- Total uses allowed
    uses_per_customer INT UNSIGNED DEFAULT 1,
    
    -- Current usage
    times_used INT UNSIGNED DEFAULT 0,
    
    -- Applicability
    applicable_to ENUM('all', 'categories', 'products', 'vendors') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'all',
    
    -- Customer eligibility
    customer_eligibility ENUM('all', 'new', 'existing', 'specific_group') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'all',
    
    -- Validity
    valid_from TIMESTAMP NULL,
    valid_until TIMESTAMP NULL,
    
    -- Status
    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
    
    -- Display
    show_on_store BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    auto_apply BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES vendors(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    
    INDEX idx_code (code),
    INDEX idx_vendor_id (vendor_id),
    INDEX idx_is_active (is_active),
    INDEX idx_valid_from (valid_from),
    INDEX idx_valid_until (valid_until)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 47: coupon_products (Products eligible for coupon)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE coupon_products (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    coupon_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    product_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    
    is_excluded BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, -- Include or exclude
    
    FOREIGN KEY (coupon_id) REFERENCES coupons(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    
    UNIQUE KEY unique_coupon_product (coupon_id, product_id),
    INDEX idx_coupon_id (coupon_id)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 48: coupon_categories (Categories eligible for coupon)
-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE coupon_categories (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    coupon_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    category_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    
    is_excluded BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (coupon_id) REFERENCES coupons(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES categories(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    
    UNIQUE KEY unique_coupon_category (coupon_id, category_id)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 49: coupon_usage (Track coupon usage)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE coupon_usage (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    coupon_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    order_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    user_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL,
    
    discount_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    
    used_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (coupon_id) REFERENCES coupons(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES orders(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
    
    INDEX idx_coupon_id (coupon_id),
    INDEX idx_order_id (order_id),
    INDEX idx_user_id (user_id)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 50: promotions (Sales campaigns & promotions)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE promotions (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL,
    
    name VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
    slug VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT NULL,
    
    -- Promotion type
    type ENUM('percentage_off', 'fixed_off', 'bogo', 'bundle', 'flash_sale') NOT NULL,
    
    -- Discount details
    discount_value DECIMAL(10, 2) NULL,
    
    -- BOGO details
    buy_quantity INT NULL,
    get_quantity INT NULL,
    get_discount_percentage DECIMAL(5, 2) DEFAULT 100.00, -- 100% = free
    
    -- Display
    banner_image_url VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    badge_text VARCHAR(50) NULL, -- e.g., "SALE", "50% OFF"
    show_countdown BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    
    -- Status
    status ENUM('draft', 'scheduled', 'active', 'expired', 'cancelled') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'draft',
    
    -- Validity
    starts_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    ends_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    
    -- Usage tracking
    total_orders INT UNSIGNED DEFAULT 0,
    total_revenue DECIMAL(15, 2) DEFAULT 0.00,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES vendors(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    
    INDEX idx_vendor_id (vendor_id),
    INDEX idx_status (status),
    INDEX idx_starts_at (starts_at),
    INDEX idx_ends_at (ends_at)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 51: promotion_products (Products in promotion)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE promotion_products (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    promotion_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    product_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    
    -- Override promotion discount for specific product
    custom_discount DECIMAL(10, 2) NULL,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (promotion_id) REFERENCES promotions(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    
    UNIQUE KEY unique_promotion_product (promotion_id, product_id)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


SECTION 9: CONTENT MANAGEMENT


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 52: pages (Static pages - About, Terms, etc.)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE pages (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    slug VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    content LONGTEXT NOT NULL,
    
    -- SEO
    meta_title VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    meta_description TEXT NULL,
    meta_keywords VARCHAR(500) NULL,
    
    -- Template
    template VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'default',
    
    -- Status
    is_published BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    
    -- Display
    show_in_footer BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    show_in_header BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    display_order INT DEFAULT 0,
    
    created_by BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (created_by) REFERENCES users(id),
    
    INDEX idx_slug (slug),
    INDEX idx_is_published (is_published)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 53: banners (Homepage & promotional banners)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE banners (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    
    title VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
    
    -- Image
    image_url VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    mobile_image_url VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    
    -- Link
    link_url VARCHAR(500) NULL,
    link_text VARCHAR(100) NULL,
    open_in_new_tab BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    
    -- Position
    position ENUM('homepage_main', 'homepage_secondary', 'category_top', 'sidebar') NOT NULL,
    
    -- Display
    display_order INT DEFAULT 0,
    
    -- Status
    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
    
    -- Schedule
    starts_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    ends_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    
    -- Stats
    impression_count INT UNSIGNED DEFAULT 0,
    click_count INT UNSIGNED DEFAULT 0,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    INDEX idx_position (position),
    INDEX idx_is_active (is_active),
    INDEX idx_display_order (display_order)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 54: blog_posts (Blog articles - Optional)
-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE blog_posts (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    slug VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    excerpt TEXT NULL,
    content LONGTEXT NOT NULL,
    
    -- Featured image
    featured_image_url VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    
    -- Author
    author_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    
    -- Category
    category VARCHAR(100) NULL,
    
    -- Tags
    tags JSON NULL,
    
    -- SEO
    meta_title VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    meta_description TEXT NULL,
    
    -- Status
    status ENUM('draft', 'published', 'archived') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'draft',
    
    -- Stats
    view_count INT UNSIGNED DEFAULT 0,
    
    -- Dates
    published_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (author_id) REFERENCES users(id),
    
    INDEX idx_slug (slug),
    INDEX idx_author_id (author_id),
    INDEX idx_status (status),
    INDEX idx_published_at (published_at),
    
    FULLTEXT INDEX ft_blog_search (title, content)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- T=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


SECTION 10: SYSTEM & SECURITY LOGS


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 56: audit_logs (System audit trail)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    
    -- User
    user_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL,
    user_email VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    user_type VARCHAR(50) NULL,
    
    -- Action
    action VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, -- create, update, delete, login, etc.
    entity_type VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, -- product, order, user, etc.
    entity_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL,
    
    -- Details
    description TEXT NULL,
    old_values JSON NULL,
    new_values JSON NULL,
    
    -- Request info
    ip_address VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
    user_agent TEXT NULL,
    url VARCHAR(500) NULL,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
    
    INDEX idx_user_id (user_id),
    INDEX idx_action (action),
    INDEX idx_entity_type (entity_type),
    INDEX idx_entity_id (entity_id),
    INDEX idx_created_at (created_at)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 57: activity_logs (User activity tracking)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE activity_logs (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    
    user_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL,
    
    -- Activity
    activity_type VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, -- page_view, search, add_to_cart, etc.
    description TEXT NULL,
    
    -- Context
    properties JSON NULL,
    
    -- Request
    ip_address VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
    user_agent TEXT NULL,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    
    INDEX idx_user_id (user_id),
    INDEX idx_activity_type (activity_type),
    INDEX idx_created_at (created_at)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 58: failed_jobs (Queue failed jobs - Laravel specific)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE failed_jobs (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    
    uuid VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    connection TEXT NOT NULL,
    queue TEXT NOT NULL,
    payload LONGTEXT NOT NULL,
    exception LONGTEXT NOT NULL,
    
    failed_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    INDEX idx_uuid (uuid)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 59: notifications (In-app notifications)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE notifications (
    id CHAR(36) PRIMARY KEY, -- UUID
    
    type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    notifiable_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    notifiable_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    
    data JSON NOT NULL,
    
    read_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    INDEX idx_notifiable (notifiable_type, notifiable_id),
    INDEX idx_read_at (read_at)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 60: email_logs (Track sent emails)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE email_logs (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    
    to_email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    from_email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    
    subject VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
    body LONGTEXT NULL,
    
    -- Type
    email_type VARCHAR(100) NULL, -- order_confirmation, password_reset, etc.
    
    -- Related entity
    related_type VARCHAR(100) NULL,
    related_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL,
    
    -- Status
    status ENUM('pending', 'sent', 'failed') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
    
    -- Error
    error_message TEXT NULL,
    
    -- Dates
    sent_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    opened_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    clicked_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    INDEX idx_to_email (to_email),
    INDEX idx_email_type (email_type),
    INDEX idx_status (status),
    INDEX idx_created_at (created_at)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 61: search_logs (Track user searches)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE search_logs (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    
    user_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL,
    
    search_query VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
    results_count INT UNSIGNED DEFAULT 0,
    
    filters JSON NULL,
    
    ip_address VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
    
    INDEX idx_user_id (user_id),
    INDEX idx_search_query (search_query(255)),
    INDEX idx_created_at (created_at)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 62: ip_blocks (Blocked IP addresses)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE ip_blocks (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    
    ip_address VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    
    reason TEXT NULL,
    
    -- Type
    block_type ENUM('manual', 'automatic', 'fraud_detection') NOT NULL,
    
    -- Status
    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
    
    -- Expiry
    expires_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    
    blocked_by BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (blocked_by) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
    
    INDEX idx_ip_address (ip_address),
    INDEX idx_is_active (is_active)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 63: fraud_checks (Fraud detection logs)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê


CREATE TABLE fraud_checks (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    
    order_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    
    -- Risk score
    risk_score INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, -- 0-100
    risk_level ENUM('low', 'medium', 'high', 'critical') NOT NULL,
    
    -- Checks performed
    checks_performed JSON NOT NULL,
    
    -- Flags
    flags JSON NULL,
    
    -- Decision
    decision ENUM('approve', 'review', 'reject') NOT NULL,
    
    -- Review
    reviewed_by BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL,
    reviewed_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    review_notes TEXT NULL,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES orders(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (reviewed_by) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
    
    INDEX idx_order_id (order_id),
    INDEX idx_risk_level (risk_level),
    INDEX idx_decision (decision)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;


‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- TABLE 64: settings (System settings - Key-Value store)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
CREATE TABLE settings (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    
    `key` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    value LONGTEXT NULL,
    
    -- Type for proper casting
    type ENUM('string', 'integer', 'boolean', 'json', 'array') DEFAULT 'string',
    
    -- Grouping
    `group` VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'general',
    
    description TEXT NULL,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    
    INDEX idx_key (`key`),
    INDEX idx_group (`group`)
