            background-color: #5568d3;
        }


        /* Info box */
        .info-box {
            background-color: #f8f9fa;
            border-left: 4px solid #667eea;
            padding: 15px;
            margin: 20px 0;
            border-radius: 4px;
        }


        /* Order table */
        .order-table {
            width: 100%;
            border-collapse: collapse;
            margin: 20px 0;
        }

        .order-table td {
            padding: 12px;
            text-align: left;
            border-bottom: 1px solid #e1e8ed;
        }

            background-color: #f8f9fa;
            font-weight: 600;
            color: #333333;
        }


        .order-table .total-row {
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 18px;
        }


        /* Footer */
        .email-footer {
            background-color: #f8f9fa;
            padding: 30px;
            text-align: center;
            color: #6c757d;
            font-size: 14px;
        }


        .email-footer a {
            color: #667eea;
            text-decoration: none;
        }


        .social-links {
            margin: 20px 0;
        }


        .social-links a {
            display: inline-block;
            margin: 0 10px;
        }


        /* Responsive */
        @media only screen and (max-width: 600px) {
            .email-container {
                width: 100% !important;
            }


            .email-content {
                padding: 20px !important;
            }


            .button {
                display: block !important;
                width: 100% !important;
                text-align: center !important;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <table class="email-wrapper" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" role="presentation">
        <tr>
            <td align="center">
                <table class="email-container" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" role="presentation">
                    <!-- Header -->
                    <tr>
                        <td class="email-header">
                            <img src="{{ asset('images/logo-white.png') }}" alt="{{ config('app.name') }}">
                            <h1>@yield('header-title')</h1>
                        </td>
                    </tr>


                    <!-- Content -->
                    <tr>
                        <td class="email-content">
                            @yield('content')
                        </td>
                    </tr>


                    <!-- Footer -->
                    <tr>
                        <td class="email-footer">
                            <div class="social-links">
                                <a href="{{ config('app.url') }}/facebook">Facebook</a>
                                <a href="{{ config('app.url') }}/twitter">Twitter</a>
                                <a href="{{ config('app.url') }}/instagram">Instagram</a>
                            </div>
                            
                            <p>
                                ¬© {{ date('Y') }} {{ config('app.name') }}. All rights reserved.
                            </p>
                            
                            <p>
                                <a href="{{ config('app.url') }}">Visit Website</a> |
                                <a href="{{ config('app.url') }}/contact">Contact Support</a> |
                                <a href="{{ config('app.url') }}/unsubscribe">Unsubscribe</a>
                            </p>
                            
                            <p style="color: #9ca3af; font-size: 12px;">
                                This email was sent to {{ $email ?? 'you' }}.
                                <br>
                                {{ config('app.name') }}, 123 Business St, City, Country
                            </p>
                        </td>
                    </tr>
                </table>
            </td>
        </tr>
    </table>
</body>
</html>
6.2 Order Confirmation Email
{{-- resources/views/emails/orders/confirmation.blade.php --}}


@extends('emails.layout.base')


@section('title', 'Order Confirmation')
@section('header-title', 'Order Confirmed! üéâ')


@section('content')
    <h2>Hi {{ $order->customer->name }}!</h2>
    
    <p>
        Thank you for your order! We're excited to let you know that we've received your order 
        and it's being processed.
    </p>


    <div class="info-box">
        <strong>Order Number:</strong> {{ $order->order_number }}<br>
        <strong>Order Date:</strong> {{ $order->created_at->format('F d, Y') }}<br>
        <strong>Total:</strong> ${{ number_format($order->total, 2) }}
    </div>


    <h3>Order Details</h3>
    
    <table class="order-table">
        <thead>
            <tr>
                <th>Item</th>
                <th>Quantity</th>
                <th>Price</th>
            </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
            @foreach($order->items as $item)
            <tr>
                <td>
                    <strong>{{ $item->product_name }}</strong>
                    @if($item->variant_attributes)
                        <br>
                        <small style="color: #6c757d;">
                            {{ implode(', ', json_decode($item->variant_attributes, true)) }}
                        </small>
                    @endif
                </td>
                <td>{{ $item->quantity }}</td>
                <td>${{ number_format($item->total_price, 2) }}</td>
            </tr>
            @endforeach
        </tbody>
        <tfoot>
            <tr>
                <td colspan="2">Subtotal:</td>
                <td>${{ number_format($order->subtotal, 2) }}</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td colspan="2">Tax:</td>
                <td>${{ number_format($order->tax, 2) }}</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td colspan="2">Shipping:</td>
                <td>${{ number_format($order->shipping_charge, 2) }}</td>
            </tr>
            @if($order->discount > 0)
            <tr>
                <td colspan="2">Discount:</td>
                <td>-${{ number_format($order->discount, 2) }}</td>
            </tr>
            @endif
            <tr class="total-row">
                <td colspan="2">Total:</td>
                <td>${{ number_format($order->total, 2) }}</td>
            </tr>
        </tfoot>
    </table>


    <h3>Shipping Address</h3>
    <div class="info-box">
        {{ $order->shippingAddress->full_name }}<br>
        {{ $order->shippingAddress->address_line1 }}<br>
        @if($order->shippingAddress->address_line2)
            {{ $order->shippingAddress->address_line2 }}<br>
        @endif
        {{ $order->shippingAddress->city }}, {{ $order->shippingAddress->state_province }} 
        {{ $order->shippingAddress->postal_code }}<br>
        {{ $order->shippingAddress->country }}
    </div>


    <center>
        <a href="{{ url('/orders/' . $order->order_number) }}" class="button">
            View Order Details
        </a>
    </center>


    <p>
        We'll send you another email when your order ships. If you have any questions, 
        please don't hesitate to contact our support team.
    </p>


    <p>
        Thank you for shopping with us!<br>
        <strong>{{ config('app.name') }} Team</strong>
    </p>
@endsection
6.3 Password Reset Email
{{-- resources/views/emails/auth/reset-password.blade.php --}}


@extends('emails.layout.base')


@section('title', 'Reset Password')
@section('header-title', 'Reset Your Password')


@section('content')
    <h2>Hi {{ $user->name }}!</h2>
    
    <p>
        You are receiving this email because we received a password reset request for your account.
    </p>


    <center>
        <a href="{{ $resetUrl }}" class="button">
            Reset Password
        </a>
    </center>


    <p>
        This password reset link will expire in {{ config('auth.passwords.users.expire') }} minutes.
    </p>


    <p>
        If you did not request a password reset, no further action is required. 
        Your password will remain unchanged.
    </p>


    <div class="info-box">
        <strong>Security Tip:</strong> Never share your password with anyone. 
        {{ config('app.name') }} will never ask for your password via email.
    </div>


    <p>
        If you're having trouble clicking the "Reset Password" button, copy and paste 
        the URL below into your web browser:
    </p>
    
    <p style="word-break: break-all; color: #667eea;">
        {{ $resetUrl }}
    </p>
@endsection
7. SMS NOTIFICATION INTEGRATION
7.1 Twilio SMS Service
<?php
// app/Services/SMS/TwilioSMSService.php


namespace App\Services\SMS;


use Twilio\Rest\Client;
use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Log;


class TwilioSMSService
{
    protected $client;
    protected $from;


    public function __construct()
    {
        $this->client = new Client(
            config('services.twilio.sid'),
            config('services.twilio.token')
        );
        
        $this->from = config('services.twilio.from');
    }


    /**
     * Send SMS
     */
    public function send(string $to, string $message): array
    {
        try {
            $result = $this->client->messages->create(
                $to,
                [
                    'from' => $this->from,
                    'body' => $message,
                ]
            );


            Log::info('SMS sent successfully', [
                'to' => $to,
                'sid' => $result->sid,
            ]);


            return [
                'success' => true,
                'sid' => $result->sid,
                'status' => $result->status,
            ];


        } catch (\Exception $e) {
            Log::error('SMS send failed', [
                'to' => $to,
                'error' => $e->getMessage(),
            ]);


            return [
                'success' => false,
                'message' => $e->getMessage(),
            ];
        }
    }


    /**
     * Send order confirmation SMS
     */
    public function sendOrderConfirmation($order): array
    {
        $message = sprintf(
            "Hi %s! Your order #%s has been confirmed. Total: $%.2f. Track: %s",
            $order->customer->name,
            $order->order_number,
            $order->total,
            url('/orders/' . $order->order_number)
        );


        return $this->send($order->customer->phone, $message);
    }


    /**
     * Send order shipped SMS
     */
    public function sendOrderShipped($order): array
    {
        $message = sprintf(
            "Good news! Your order #%s has been shipped. Tracking: %s",
            $order->order_number,
            $order->tracking_number ?? 'N/A'
        );


        return $this->send($order->customer->phone, $message);
    }


    /**
     * Send OTP
     */
    public function sendOTP(string $phone, string $otp): array
    {
        $message = sprintf(
            "Your %s verification code is: %s. Valid for 5 minutes. Do not share this code.",
            config('app.name'),
            $otp
        );


        return $this->send($phone, $message);
    }


    /**
     * Send low stock alert to vendor
     */
    public function sendLowStockAlert($product, $vendor): array
    {
        $message = sprintf(
            "Low stock alert! %s (SKU: %s) has only %d units left.",
            $product->name,
            $product->sku,
            $product->stock_quantity
        );


        return $this->send($vendor->business_phone, $message);
    }
}
<?php
// config/services.php


return [
    // ... other services


    'twilio' => [
        'sid' => env('TWILIO_SID'),
        'token' => env('TWILIO_TOKEN'),
        'from' => env('TWILIO_FROM'),
    ],
];
7.2 SMS Notification Channel
<?php
// app/Notifications/OrderStatusSMSNotification.php


namespace App\Notifications;


use App\Models\Order;
use Illuminate\Bus\Queueable;
use Illuminate\Contracts\Queue\ShouldQueue;
use Illuminate\Notifications\Notification;
use App\Channels\TwilioSMSChannel;


class OrderStatusSMSNotification extends Notification implements ShouldQueue
{
    use Queueable;


    public function __construct(
        public Order $order,
        public string $status
    ) {}


    /**
     * Get notification channels
     */
    public function via($notifiable): array
    {
        // Only send SMS if user has phone and SMS enabled
        if ($notifiable->phone && ($notifiable->notification_preferences['sms'] ?? false)) {
            return [TwilioSMSChannel::class];
        }


        return [];
    }


    /**
     * Get SMS representation
     */
    public function toSMS($notifiable): string
    {
        return match($this->status) {
            'shipped' => "Your order #{$this->order->order_number} has been shipped! Track: " . 
                         url('/orders/' . $this->order->order_number),
            
            'delivered' => "Great news! Your order #{$this->order->order_number} has been delivered. Thank you!",
            
            'cancelled' => "Your order #{$this->order->order_number} has been cancelled. Refund processed.",
            
            default => "Order #{$this->order->order_number} status: {$this->status}",
        };
    }
}


// Custom SMS Channel
// app/Channels/TwilioSMSChannel.php


namespace App\Channels;


use Illuminate\Notifications\Notification;
use App\Services\SMS\TwilioSMSService;


class TwilioSMSChannel
{
    protected $sms;


    public function __construct(TwilioSMSService $sms)
    {
        $this->sms = $sms;
    }


    public function send($notifiable, Notification $notification)
    {
        $message = $notification->toSMS($notifiable);
        
        return $this->sms->send($notifiable->phone, $message);
    }
}
8. IMAGE PROCESSING & CDN INTEGRATION
8.1 Advanced Image Processing Service
<?php
// app/Services/Image/ImageProcessingService.php


namespace App\Services\Image;


use Intervention\Image\Facades\Image;
use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Storage;
use Illuminate\Support\Str;
use Spatie\ImageOptimizer\OptimizerChainFactory;


class ImageProcessingService
{
    protected $disk;
    protected $sizes = [
        'thumbnail' => ['width' => 150, 'height' => 150],
        'small' => ['width' => 300, 'height' => 300],
        'medium' => ['width' => 600, 'height' => 600],
        'large' => ['width' => 1200, 'height' => 1200],
    ];


    public function __construct()
    {
        $this->disk = config('filesystems.default');
    }


    /**
     * Process and upload image with multiple sizes
     */
    public function processAndUpload($file, string $directory = 'images'): array
    {
        // Validate image
        $this->validateImage($file);


        // Generate unique filename
        $filename = $this->generateFilename($file);


        // Process original image
        $originalPath = $this->processOriginal($file, $directory, $filename);


        // Generate responsive sizes
        $sizes = $this->generateResponsiveSizes($file, $directory, $filename);


        return [
            'filename' => $filename,
            'original' => $originalPath,
            'sizes' => $sizes,
            'file_size' => $file->getSize(),
            'mime_type' => $file->getMimeType(),
            'dimensions' => $this->getImageDimensions($file),
        ];
    }


    /**
     * Validate image file
     */
    protected function validateImage($file): void
    {
        $maxSize = 10 * 1024 * 1024; // 10MB
        $allowedMimes = ['image/jpeg', 'image/jpg', 'image/png', 'image/webp', 'image/gif'];


        if ($file->getSize() > $maxSize) {
            throw new \Exception('Image size must not exceed 10MB');
        }


        if (!in_array($file->getMimeType(), $allowedMimes)) {
            throw new \Exception('Invalid image format. Allowed: JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF');
        }


        // Check image integrity
        try {
            $image = Image::make($file);
            if ($image->width() < 100 || $image->height() < 100) {
                throw new \Exception('Image dimensions must be at least 100x100 pixels');
            }
        } catch (\Exception $e) {
            throw new \Exception('Invalid or corrupted image file');
        }
    }


    /**
     * Generate unique filename
     */
    protected function generateFilename($file): string
    {
        $extension = $file->getClientOriginalExtension();
        return Str::uuid() . '.' . $extension;
    }


    /**
     * Process original image
     */
    protected function processOriginal($file, string $directory, string $filename): string
    {
        $image = Image::make($file);


        // Auto-orient based on EXIF data
        $image->orientate();


        // Remove EXIF data for privacy
        $image->encode($image->extension, 90);


        // Save original
        $path = "{$directory}/original/{$filename}";
        Storage::disk($this->disk)->put($path, (string) $image);


        return Storage::disk($this->disk)->url($path);
    }


    /**
     * Generate responsive sizes
     */
    protected function generateResponsiveSizes($file, string $directory, string $filename): array
    {
        $urls = [];
        $image = Image::make($file);


        foreach ($this->sizes as $sizeName => $dimensions) {
            $resized = clone $image;


            // Resize maintaining aspect ratio
            $resized->resize($dimensions['width'], $dimensions['height'], function ($constraint) {
                $constraint->aspectRatio();
                $constraint->upsize();
            });


            // Add watermark for large images
            if ($sizeName === 'large') {
                $this->addWatermark($resized);
            }


            // Convert to WebP for better compression
            $webpFilename = pathinfo($filename, PATHINFO_FILENAME) . '.webp';
            $resized->encode('webp', 85);


            // Save
            $path = "{$directory}/{$sizeName}/{$webpFilename}";
            Storage::disk($this->disk)->put($path, (string) $resized);


            // Optimize
            $this->optimizeImage(Storage::disk($this->disk)->path($path));


            $urls[$sizeName] = Storage::disk($this->disk)->url($path);
        }


        return $urls;
    }


    /**
     * Add watermark to image
     */
    protected function addWatermark($image): void
    {
        $watermarkPath = public_path('images/watermark.png');


        if (file_exists($watermarkPath)) {
            $watermark = Image::make($watermarkPath);


            // Resize watermark to 10% of image width
            $watermark->resize($image->width() * 0.1, null, function ($constraint) {
                $constraint->aspectRatio();
            });


            // Position at bottom-right with 20px padding
            $image->insert($watermark, 'bottom-right', 20, 20);
        }
    }


    /**
     * Optimize image file
     */
    protected function optimizeImage(string $path): void
    {
        $optimizerChain = OptimizerChainFactory::create();
        $optimizerChain->optimize($path);
    }


    /**
     * Get image dimensions
     */
    protected function getImageDimensions($file): array
    {
        $image = Image::make($file);
        return [
            'width' => $image->width(),
            'height' => $image->height(),
        ];
    }


    /**
     * Delete image and all sizes
     */
    public function delete(string $directory, string $filename): void
    {
        // Delete original
        Storage::disk($this->disk)->delete("{$directory}/original/{$filename}");


        // Delete all sizes
        $webpFilename = pathinfo($filename, PATHINFO_FILENAME) . '.webp';
        foreach (array_keys($this->sizes) as $sizeName) {
            Storage::disk($this->disk)->delete("{$directory}/{$sizeName}/{$webpFilename}");
        }
    }


    /**
     * Crop image to specific dimensions
     */
    public function crop($file, int $width, int $height, int $x = 0, int $y = 0): string
    {
        $image = Image::make($file);
        $image->crop($width, $height, $x, $y);


        $filename = $this->generateFilename($file);
        $path = "crops/{$filename}";


        Storage::disk($this->disk)->put($path, (string) $image->encode('webp', 85));


        return Storage::disk($this->disk)->url($path);
    }


    /**
     * Create thumbnail from video (for product videos)
     */
    public function createVideoThumbnail(string $videoPath, float $second = 1.0): string
    {
        // Requires FFmpeg
        $ffmpeg = \FFMpeg\FFMpeg::create();
        $video = $ffmpeg->open($videoPath);


        $frame = $video->frame(\FFMpeg\Coordinate\TimeCode::fromSeconds($second));
        $filename = Str::uuid() . '.jpg';
        $thumbnailPath = storage_path("app/temp/{$filename}");


        $frame->save($thumbnailPath);


        // Process and upload thumbnail
        $result = $this->processAndUpload(new \Illuminate\Http\File($thumbnailPath), 'video-thumbnails');


        // Clean up temp file
        unlink($thumbnailPath);


        return $result['sizes']['medium'];
    }
}
8.2 CloudFlare CDN Integration
<?php
// config/filesystems.php


return [
    'default' => env('FILESYSTEM_DISK', 's3'),


    'disks' => [
        's3' => [
            'driver' => 's3',
            'key' => env('AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID'),
            'secret' => env('AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY'),
            'region' => env('AWS_DEFAULT_REGION'),
            'bucket' => env('AWS_BUCKET'),
            'url' => env('AWS_URL'),
            'endpoint' => env('AWS_ENDPOINT'),
            'use_path_style_endpoint' => env('AWS_USE_PATH_STYLE_ENDPOINT', false),
        ],


        'cloudflare' => [
            'driver' => 's3',
            'key' => env('CLOUDFLARE_R2_ACCESS_KEY_ID'),
            'secret' => env('CLOUDFLARE_R2_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY'),
            'region' => 'auto',
            'bucket' => env('CLOUDFLARE_R2_BUCKET'),
            'url' => env('CLOUDFLARE_R2_URL'),
            'endpoint' => env('CLOUDFLARE_R2_ENDPOINT'),
        ],
    ],
];
<?php
// app/Services/CDN/CloudFlareCDNService.php


namespace App\Services\CDN;


use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Http;
use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Log;


class CloudFlareCDNService
{
    protected $zoneId;
    protected $apiToken;


    public function __construct()
    {
        $this->zoneId = config('services.cloudflare.zone_id');
        $this->apiToken = config('services.cloudflare.api_token');
    }


    /**
     * Purge CDN cache for specific URLs
     */
    public function purgeCache(array $urls): array
    {
        try {
            $response = Http::withToken($this->apiToken)
                ->post("https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/{$this->zoneId}/purge_cache", [
                    'files' => $urls,
                ]);


            if ($response->successful()) {
                Log::info('CDN cache purged', ['urls' => $urls]);


                return [
                    'success' => true,
                    'message' => 'Cache purged successfully',
                ];
            }


            return [
                'success' => false,
                'message' => 'Failed to purge cache',
                'errors' => $response->json()['errors'] ?? [],
            ];


        } catch (\Exception $e) {
            Log::error('CDN cache purge failed', [
                'error' => $e->getMessage(),
            ]);


            return [
                'success' => false,
                'message' => $e->getMessage(),
            ];
        }
    }


    /**
     * Purge entire CDN cache
     */
    public function purgeAll(): array
    {
        try {
            $response = Http::withToken($this->apiToken)
                ->post("https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/{$this->zoneId}/purge_cache", [
                    'purge_everything' => true,
                ]);


            if ($response->successful()) {
                Log::info('Entire CDN cache purged');


                return [
                    'success' => true,
                    'message' => 'Entire cache purged successfully',
                ];
            }


            return [
                'success' => false,
                'message' => 'Failed to purge cache',
            ];


        } catch (\Exception $e) {
            Log::error('CDN full cache purge failed', [
                'error' => $e->getMessage(),
            ]);


            return [
                'success' => false,
                'message' => $e->getMessage(),
            ];
        }
    }


    /**
     * Get CDN statistics
     */
    public function getStatistics(int $days = 30): array
    {
        $since = now()->subDays($days)->toIso8601String();


        try {
            $response = Http::withToken($this->apiToken)
                ->get("https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/{$this->zoneId}/analytics/dashboard", [
                    'since' => $since,
                ]);


            if ($response->successful()) {
                return [
                    'success' => true,
                    'data' => $response->json()['result'] ?? [],
                ];
            }


            return [
                'success' => false,
                'message' => 'Failed to fetch statistics',
            ];


        } catch (\Exception $e) {
            return [
                'success' => false,
                'message' => $e->getMessage(),
            ];
        }
    }
}
9. BACKUP & DISASTER RECOVERY
9.1 Automated Database Backup
<?php
// app/Console/Commands/BackupDatabase.php


namespace App\Console\Commands;


use Illuminate\Console\Command;
use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Storage;
use Illuminate\Support\Facades\DB;


class BackupDatabase extends Command
{
    protected $signature = 'backup:database 
                            {--compress : Compress the backup file}
                            {--disk=s3 : Storage disk to use}';


    protected $description = 'Create a backup of the database';


    public function handle()
    {
        $this->info('Starting database backup...');


        $database = config('database.connections.pgsql.database');
        $username = config('database.connections.pgsql.username');
        $password = config('database.connections.pgsql.password');
        $host = config('database.connections.pgsql.host');
        $port = config('database.connections.pgsql.port');


        $filename = sprintf(
            'backup_%s_%s.sql',
            $database,
            now()->format('Y-m-d_His')
        );


        $backupPath = storage_path("app/backups/{$filename}");


        // Create backups directory if doesn't exist
        if (!file_exists(dirname($backupPath))) {
            mkdir(dirname($backupPath), 0755, true);
        }


        // Execute pg_dump
        $command = sprintf(
            'PGPASSWORD="%s" pg_dump -h %s -p %s -U %s -F p -b -v -f "%s" %s 2>&1',
            $password,
            $host,
            $port,
            $username,
            $backupPath,
            $database
        );


        exec($command, $output, $returnCode);


        if ($returnCode !== 0) {
            $this->error('Backup failed!');
            $this->error(implode("\n", $output));
            return 1;
        }


        // Compress if requested
        if ($this->option('compress')) {
            $this->info('Compressing backup...');
            $compressedPath = $backupPath . '.gz';
            exec("gzip -c {$backupPath} > {$compressedPath}");
            unlink($backupPath);
            $backupPath = $compressedPath;
            $filename .= '.gz';
        }


        // Upload to cloud storage
        $disk = $this->option('disk');
        $this->info("Uploading to {$disk}...");


        $uploaded = Storage::disk($disk)->put(
            "backups/{$filename}",
            file_get_contents($backupPath)
        );


        if ($uploaded) {
            $this->info("‚úÖ Backup uploaded successfully to {$disk}");
            
            // Clean up local file
            unlink($backupPath);


            // Delete old backups (keep last 30 days)
            $this->cleanOldBackups($disk);


            // Send notification
            $this->notifySuccess($filename);
        } else {
            $this->error('Failed to upload backup');
            return 1;
        }


        return 0;
    }


    protected function cleanOldBackups(string $disk): void
    {
        $files = Storage::disk($disk)->files('backups');
        $cutoffDate = now()->subDays(30);


        foreach ($files as $file) {
            $lastModified = Storage::disk($disk)->lastModified($file);
            
            if ($lastModified < $cutoffDate->timestamp) {
                Storage::disk($disk)->delete($file);
                $this->info("Deleted old backup: {$file}");
            }
        }
    }


    protected function notifySuccess(string $filename): void
    {
        // Send notification to admins
        $admins = \App\Models\User::where('role', 'admin')->get();
        
        foreach ($admins as $admin) {
            $admin->notify(new \App\Notifications\BackupCompletedNotification($filename));
        }
    }
}


// Schedule in Kernel.php
protected function schedule(Schedule $schedule)
{
    // Daily backup at 2 AM
    $schedule->command('backup:database --compress --disk=s3')
             ->dailyAt('02:00')
             ->withoutOverlapping()
             ->emailOutputOnFailure(config('mail.admin_email'));
}
9.2 Files Backup Script
<?php
// app/Console/Commands/BackupFiles.php


namespace App\Console\Commands;


use Illuminate\Console\Command;
use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Storage;
use ZipArchive;


class BackupFiles extends Command
{
    protected $signature = 'backup:files {--disk=s3}';
    protected $description = 'Create a backup of uploaded files';


    public function handle()
    {
        $this->info('Starting files backup...');


        $filename = sprintf(
            'files_backup_%s.zip',
            now()->format('Y-m-d_His')
        );


        $zipPath = storage_path("app/backups/{$filename}");


        // Create ZIP archive
        $zip = new ZipArchive();
        
        if ($zip->open($zipPath, ZipArchive::CREATE | ZipArchive::OVERWRITE) !== true) {
            $this->error('Failed to create ZIP archive');
            return 1;
        }


        // Add storage/app/public to archive
        $publicPath = storage_path('app/public');
        $files = new \RecursiveIteratorIterator(
            new \RecursiveDirectoryIterator($publicPath),
            \RecursiveIteratorIterator::LEAVES_ONLY
        );


        $fileCount = 0;
        foreach ($files as $file) {
            if (!$file->isDir()) {
                $filePath = $file->getRealPath();
                $relativePath = substr($filePath, strlen($publicPath) + 1);
                
                $zip->addFile($filePath, $relativePath);
                $fileCount++;


                if ($fileCount % 100 === 0) {
                    $this->info("Added {$fileCount} files...");
                }
            }
        }


        $zip->close();


        $this->info("ZIP created with {$fileCount} files");


        // Upload to cloud
        $disk = $this->option('disk');
        $this->info("Uploading to {$disk}...");


        $uploaded = Storage::disk($disk)->put(
            "file-backups/{$filename}",
            file_get_contents($zipPath)
        );


        if ($uploaded) {
            $this->info("‚úÖ Files backup uploaded successfully");
            unlink($zipPath);
            return 0;
        }


        $this->error('Failed to upload backup');
        return 1;
    }
}
9.3 Restore Database Command
<?php
// app/Console/Commands/RestoreDatabase.php


namespace App\Console\Commands;


use Illuminate\Console\Command;
use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Storage;


class RestoreDatabase extends Command
{
    protected $signature = 'backup:restore 
                            {file : Backup filename}
                            {--disk=s3 : Storage disk}
                            {--force : Skip confirmation}';


    protected $description = 'Restore database from backup';


    public function handle()
    {
        if (!$this->option('force')) {
            if (!$this->confirm('‚ö†Ô∏è  This will OVERWRITE the current database. Continue?')) {
                $this->info('Restore cancelled');
                return 0;
            }
        }


        $filename = $this->argument('file');
        $disk = $this->option('disk');


        $this->info("Downloading backup from {$disk}...");


        if (!Storage::disk($disk)->exists("backups/{$filename}")) {
            $this->error('Backup file not found');
            return 1;
        }


        $backupPath = storage_path("app/temp/{$filename}");
        
        // Download from cloud
        file_put_contents(
            $backupPath,
            Storage::disk($disk)->get("backups/{$filename}")
        );


        // Decompress if needed
        if (str_ends_with($filename, '.gz')) {
            $this->info('Decompressing backup...');
            exec("gunzip {$backupPath}");
            $backupPath = str_replace('.gz', '', $backupPath);
        }


        $this->info('Restoring database...');


        $database = config('database.connections.pgsql.database');
        $username = config('database.connections.pgsql.username');
        $password = config('database.connections.pgsql.password');
        $host = config('database.connections.pgsql.host');
        $port = config('database.connections.pgsql.port');


        // Restore
        $command = sprintf(
            'PGPASSWORD="%s" psql -h %s -p %s -U %s -d %s -f "%s" 2>&1',
            $password,
            $host,
            $port,
            $username,
            $database,
            $backupPath
        );


        exec($command, $output, $returnCode);


        // Clean up
        unlink($backupPath);


        if ($returnCode === 0) {
            $this->info('‚úÖ Database restored successfully');
            
            // Clear caches
            $this->call('cache:clear');
            $this->call('config:clear');
            
            return 0;
        }


        $this->error('Restore failed');
        $this->error(implode("\n", $output));
        return 1;
    }
}
10. API DOCUMENTATION (SWAGGER/OPENAPI)
10.1 Install L5-Swagger
bash
composer require darkaonline/l5-swagger
php artisan vendor:publish --provider "L5Swagger\L5SwaggerServiceProvider"
10.2 Swagger Annotations
<?php
// app/Http/Controllers/Api/V1/ProductController.php


namespace App\Http\Controllers\Api\V1;


use App\Http\Controllers\Controller;


/**
 * @OA\Info(
 *     title="E-commerce Platform API",
 *     version="1.0.0",
 *     description="API documentation for multi-vendor e-commerce platform",
 *     @OA\Contact(
 *         email="api@platform.com"
 *     )
 * )
 * 
 * @OA\Server(
 *     url="https://api.platform.com",
 *     description="Production API Server"
 * )
 * 
 * @OA\Server(
 *     url="http://localhost:8000",
 *     description="Development API Server"
 * )
 * 
 * @OA\SecurityScheme(
 *     type="http",
 *     description="Login with email and password to get the authentication token",
 *     name="bearerAuth",
 *     in="header",
 *     scheme="bearer",
 *     bearerFormat="JWT",
 *     securityScheme="bearerAuth",
 * )
 */
class ProductController extends Controller
{
    /**
     * @OA\Get(
     *     path="/api/v1/products",
     *     summary="Get list of products",
     *     description="Returns paginated list of products with filters",
     *     operationId="getProducts",
     *     tags={"Products"},
     *     @OA\Parameter(
     *         name="page",
     *         in="query",
     *         description="Page number",
     *         required=false,
     *         @OA\Schema(type="integer", example=1)
     *     ),
     *     @OA\Parameter(
     *         name="per_page",
     *         in="query",
     *         description="Items per page",
     *         required=false,
     *         @OA\Schema(type="integer", example=20, maximum=100)
     *     ),
     *     @OA\Parameter(
     *         name="category",
     *         in="query",
     *         description="Filter by category ID",
     *         required=false,
     *         @OA\Schema(type="integer")
     *     ),
     *     @OA\Parameter(
     *         name="min_price",
     *         in="query",
     *         description="Minimum price filter",
     *         required=false,
     *         @OA\Schema(type="number", format="float")
     *     ),
     *     @OA\Parameter(
     *         name="max_price",
     *         in="query",
     *         description="Maximum price filter",
     *         required=false,
     *         @OA\Schema(type="number", format="float")
     *     ),
     *     @OA\Parameter(
     *         name="sort",
     *         in="query",
     *         description="Sort order",
     *         required=false,
     *         @OA\Schema(
     *             type="string",
     *             enum={"newest", "price_low", "price_high", "popular", "rating"}
     *         )
     *     ),
     *     @OA\Response(
     *         response=200,
     *         description="Successful operation",
     *         @OA\JsonContent(
     *             @OA\Property(property="success", type="boolean", example=true),
     *             @OA\Property(property="data", type="array",
     *                 @OA\Items(ref="#/components/schemas/Product")
     *             ),
     *             @OA\Property(property="meta", type="object",
     *                 @OA\Property(property="current_page", type="integer"),
     *                 @OA\Property(property="last_page", type="integer"),
     *                 @OA\Property(property="per_page", type="integer"),
     *                 @OA\Property(property="total", type="integer")
     *             )
     *         )
     *     )
     * )
     */
    public function index(Request $request)
    {
        // Implementation
    }


    /**
     * @OA\Get(
     *     path="/api/v1/products/{slug}",
     *     summary="Get product by slug",
     *     description="Returns single product with full details",
     *     operationId="getProductBySlug",
     *     tags={"Products"},
     *     @OA\Parameter(
     *         name="slug",
     *         in="path",
     *         description="Product slug",
     *         required=true,
     *         @OA\Schema(type="string")
     *     ),
     *     @OA\Response(
     *         response=200,
     *         description="Successful operation",
     *         @OA\JsonContent(
     *             @OA\Property(property="success", type="boolean", example=true),
     *             @OA\Property(property="data", ref="#/components/schemas/ProductDetail")
     *         )
     *     ),
     *     @OA\Response(
     *         response=404,
     *         description="Product not found",
     *         @OA\JsonContent(
     *             @OA\Property(property="success", type="boolean", example=false),
     *             @OA\Property(property="message", type="string", example="Product not found")
     *         )
     *     )
     * )
     */
    public function show(string $slug)
    {
        // Implementation
    }


    /**
     * @OA\Post(
     *     path="/api/v1/vendor/products",
     *     summary="Create new product",
     *     description="Create a new product (vendor only)",
     *     operationId="createProduct",
     *     tags={"Vendor Products"},
     *     security={{"bearerAuth":{}}},
     *     @OA\RequestBody(
     *         required=true,
     *         @OA\JsonContent(ref="#/components/schemas/ProductCreate")
     *     ),
     *     @OA\Response(
     *         response=201,
     *         description="Product created successfully",
     *         @OA\JsonContent(
     *             @OA\Property(property="success", type="boolean", example=true),
     *             @OA\Property(property="message", type="string"),
     *             @OA\Property(property="data", ref="#/components/schemas/Product")
     *         )
     *     ),
     *     @OA\Response(
     *         response=422,
     *         description="Validation error",
     *         @OA\JsonContent(
     *             @OA\Property(property="success", type="boolean", example=false),
     *             @OA\Property(property="message", type="string"),
     *             @OA\Property(property="errors", type="object")
     *         )
     *     ),
     *     @OA\Response(
     *         response=401,
     *         description="Unauthenticated"
     *     ),
     *     @OA\Response(
     *         response=403,
     *         description="Forbidden - Vendor role required"
     *     )
     * )
     */
    public function store(Request $request)
    {
        // Implementation
    }
}
10.3 Schema Definitions
<?php
// app/Http/Resources/ProductResource.php


namespace App\Http\Resources;


use Illuminate\Http\Resources\Json\JsonResource;


/**
 * @OA\Schema(
 *     schema="Product",
 *     title="Product",
 *     description="Product model",
 *     @OA\Property(property="id", type="integer", example=1),
 *     @OA\Property(property="name", type="string", example="MacBook Pro 14\""),
 *     @OA\Property(property="slug", type="string", example="macbook-pro-14"),
 *     @OA\Property(property="sku", type="string", example="MBP-14-001"),
 *     @OA\Property(property="regular_price", type="number", format="float", example=2499.00),
 *     @OA\Property(property="sale_price", type="number", format="float", example=2299.00, nullable=true),
 *     @OA\Property(property="stock_quantity", type="integer", example=10),
 *     @OA\Property(property="stock_status", type="string", example="in_stock"),
 *     @OA\Property(property="average_rating", type="number", format="float", example=4.5),
 *     @OA\Property(property="total_reviews", type="integer", example=25),
 *     @OA\Property(property="is_featured", type="boolean", example=true),
 *     @OA\Property(property="vendor", ref="#/components/schemas/Vendor"),
 *     @OA\Property(property="category", ref="#/components/schemas/Category"),
 *     @OA\Property(property="primary_image", type="string", example="https://cdn.platform.com/products/1/thumb.jpg")
 * )
 * 
 * @OA\Schema(
 *     schema="ProductCreate",
 *     title="Product Create",
 *     description="Product creation request",
 *     required={"name", "category_id", "type", "description"},
 *     @OA\Property(property="name", type="string", example="MacBook Pro 14\""),
 *     @OA\Property(property="category_id", type="integer", example=1),
 *     @OA\Property(property="type", type="string", enum={"simple", "variable"}, example="simple"),
 *     @OA\Property(property="description", type="string"),
 *     @OA\Property(property="short_description", type="string", nullable=true),
 *     @OA\Property(property="brand", type="string", example="Apple", nullable=true),
 *     @OA\Property(property="sku", type="string", example="MBP-14-001"),
 *     @OA\Property(property="regular_price", type="number", format="float", example=2499.00),
 *     @OA\Property(property="sale_price", type="number", format="float", example=2299.00, nullable=true),
 *     @OA\Property(property="stock_quantity", type="integer", example=10),
 *     @OA\Property(property="weight", type="number", format="float", example=1.60, nullable=true)
 * )
 */
class ProductResource extends JsonResource
{
    // Implementation
}
üß©
Design Patterns, OOP & Architecture Guide
Multi-Vendor E-commerce Platform  ¬∑  Feb 2026  ¬∑  v2.0

DESIGN PATTERNS, OOP & ARCHITECTURE GUIDE

TABLE OF CONTENTS

1. Design Patterns for E-commerce Platform

2. OOP Principles & Implementation

3. Architectural Patterns

4. SOLID Principles in Practice

5. Repository Pattern

6. Service Layer Pattern

7. Observer Pattern

8. Factory Pattern

9. Strategy Pattern

10. Dependency Injection

11. Event-Driven Architecture

12. Domain-Driven Design (DDD)

1. DESIGN PATTERNS FOR E-COMMERCE PLATFORM

1.1 Overview of Patterns Used

2. OOP PRINCIPLES & IMPLEMENTATION

2.1 Four Pillars of OOP

Encapsulation (Encapsulation)

<?php

// ‚úÖ GOOD - Proper encapsulation

namespace App\Models;

class Order

{

// Private properties - cannot be accessed directly

    private float $subtotal;
    private float $tax;
    private float $shipping;
    private float $discount;
    private float $total;


    // Public getters - controlled access
    public function getSubtotal(): float
    {
        return $this->subtotal;
    }


    public function getTotal(): float
    {
        return $this->total;
    }


    // Public setters with validation - controlled modification
    public function setDiscount(float $discount): void
    {
        if ($discount < 0) {
            throw new \InvalidArgumentException('Discount cannot be negative');
        }


        if ($discount > $this->subtotal) {
            throw new \InvalidArgumentException('Discount cannot exceed subtotal');
        }


        $this->discount = $discount;
        $this->recalculateTotal();
    }


    // Private helper method - internal logic hidden
    private function recalculateTotal(): void
    {
        $this->total = $this->subtotal + $this->tax + $this->shipping - $this->discount;
    }


    // Public method for applying coupon - business logic encapsulated
    public function applyCoupon(Coupon $coupon): void
    {
        $discount = $coupon->calculateDiscount($this->subtotal);
        $this->setDiscount($discount);
    }
}


// ‚ùå BAD - No encapsulation
class BadOrder
{
    public $subtotal;
    public $tax;
    public $total;


    // Anyone can set invalid values
    // $order->total = -100; // No validation!
}
Inheritance (‡¶â‡¶§‡ßç‡¶§‡¶∞‡¶æ‡¶ß‡¶ø‡¶ï‡¶æ‡¶∞)
php
<?php
// Base class for all payment methods


namespace App\Services\Payment;


abstract class PaymentGateway
{
    protected string $transactionId;
    protected float $amount;
    protected string $currency;


    // Template method pattern
    final public function processPayment(Order $order): PaymentResult
    {
        $this->validateOrder($order);
        $this->initializeTransaction($order);
        
        $result = $this->executePayment();
        
        $this->logTransaction($result);
        $this->notifyCustomer($result);
        
        return $result;
    }


    // Common validation for all payment methods
    protected function validateOrder(Order $order): void
    {
        if ($order->total <= 0) {
            throw new \InvalidArgumentException('Invalid order amount');
        }


        if (!$order->isPaid()) {
            throw new \RuntimeException('Order already paid');
        }
    }


    // Abstract methods - must be implemented by child classes
    abstract protected function executePayment(): PaymentResult;
    abstract protected function refund(float $amount): RefundResult;


    // Common logging
    protected function logTransaction(PaymentResult $result): void
    {
        \Log::info('Payment processed', [
            'gateway' => get_class($this),
            'transaction_id' => $this->transactionId,
            'amount' => $this->amount,
            'status' => $result->status,
        ]);
    }


    protected function notifyCustomer(PaymentResult $result): void
    {
        // Common notification logic
    }
}


// Child class - Stripe implementation
class StripePaymentGateway extends PaymentGateway
{
    private \Stripe\StripeClient $stripe;


    public function __construct()
    {
        $this->stripe = new \Stripe\StripeClient(config('services.stripe.secret'));
    }


    protected function executePayment(): PaymentResult
    {
        try {
            $paymentIntent = $this->stripe->paymentIntents->create([
                'amount' => $this->amount * 100,
                'currency' => $this->currency,
            ]);


            $this->transactionId = $paymentIntent->id;


            return new PaymentResult(
                success: true,
                transactionId: $paymentIntent->id,
                status: $paymentIntent->status
            );


        } catch (\Exception $e) {
            return new PaymentResult(
                success: false,
                message: $e->getMessage()
            );
        }
    }


    protected function refund(float $amount): RefundResult
    {
        // Stripe-specific refund logic
    }
}


// Child class - SSLCommerz implementation
class SSLCommerzPaymentGateway extends PaymentGateway
{
    protected function executePayment(): PaymentResult
    {
        // SSLCommerz-specific payment logic
    }


    protected function refund(float $amount): RefundResult
    {
        // SSLCommerz-specific refund logic
    }
}
Polymorphism (‡¶¨‡¶π‡ßÅ‡¶∞‡ßÇ‡¶™‡¶§‡¶æ)
php
<?php
namespace App\Services\Shipping;


// Interface defines contract
interface ShippingProvider
{
    public function calculateCost(Order $order): float;
    public function estimateDelivery(Order $order): \Carbon\Carbon;
    public function createShipment(Order $order): Shipment;
}


// Different implementations
class FedExShipping implements ShippingProvider
{
    public function calculateCost(Order $order): float
    {
        $weight = $order->getTotalWeight();
        $distance = $this->calculateDistance($order->shippingAddress);
        
        return $weight * 0.5 + $distance * 0.1 + 5.00;
    }


    public function estimateDelivery(Order $order): \Carbon\Carbon
    {
        return now()->addDays(3);
    }


    public function createShipment(Order $order): Shipment
    {
        // FedEx API call
    }
}


class DHLShipping implements ShippingProvider
{
    public function calculateCost(Order $order): float
    {
        // Different calculation logic
        return $order->getTotalWeight() * 0.6 + 10.00;
    }


    public function estimateDelivery(Order $order): \Carbon\Carbon
    {
        return now()->addDays(2); // Faster delivery
    }


    public function createShipment(Order $order): Shipment
    {
        // DHL API call
    }
}


class LocalDelivery implements ShippingProvider
{
    public function calculateCost(Order $order): float
    {
        return 5.00; // Flat rate
    }


    public function estimateDelivery(Order $order): \Carbon\Carbon
    {
        return now()->addDay(); // Same-day or next-day
    }
Inheritance (‡¶â‡¶§‡ßç‡¶§‡¶∞‡¶æ‡¶ß‡¶ø‡¶ï‡¶æ‡¶∞)
php<?php
// Base class for all payment methods


namespace App\Services\Payment;


abstract class PaymentGateway
{
    protected string $transactionId;
    protected float $amount;
    protected string $currency;


    // Template method pattern
    final public function processPayment(Order $order): PaymentResult
    {
        $this->validateOrder($order);
        $this->initializeTransaction($order);
        
        $result = $this->executePayment();
        
        $this->logTransaction($result);
        $this->notifyCustomer($result);
        
        return $result;
    }


    // Common validation for all payment methods
    protected function validateOrder(Order $order): void
    {
        if ($order->total <= 0) {
            throw new \InvalidArgumentException('Invalid order amount');
        }


        if (!$order->isPaid()) {
            throw new \RuntimeException('Order already paid');
        }
    }


    // Abstract methods - must be implemented by child classes
    abstract protected function executePayment(): PaymentResult;
    abstract protected function refund(float $amount): RefundResult;


    // Common logging
    protected function logTransaction(PaymentResult $result): void
    {
        \Log::info('Payment processed', [
            'gateway' => get_class($this),
            'transaction_id' => $this->transactionId,
            'amount' => $this->amount,
            'status' => $result->status,
        ]);
    }


    protected function notifyCustomer(PaymentResult $result): void
    {
        // Common notification logic
    }
}


// Child class - Stripe implementation
class StripePaymentGateway extends PaymentGateway
{
    private \Stripe\StripeClient $stripe;


    public function __construct()
    {
        $this->stripe = new \Stripe\StripeClient(config('services.stripe.secret'));
    }


    protected function executePayment(): PaymentResult
    {
        try {
            $paymentIntent = $this->stripe->paymentIntents->create([
                'amount' => $this->amount * 100,
                'currency' => $this->currency,
            ]);


            $this->transactionId = $paymentIntent->id;


            return new PaymentResult(
                success: true,
                transactionId: $paymentIntent->id,
                status: $paymentIntent->status
            );


        } catch (\Exception $e) {
            return new PaymentResult(
                success: false,
                message: $e->getMessage()
            );
        }
    }


    protected function refund(float $amount): RefundResult
    {
        // Stripe-specific refund logic
    }
}


// Child class - SSLCommerz implementation
class SSLCommerzPaymentGateway extends PaymentGateway
{
    protected function executePayment(): PaymentResult
    {
        // SSLCommerz-specific payment logic
    }


    protected function refund(float $amount): RefundResult
    {
        // SSLCommerz-specific refund logic
    }
}
Polymorphism (‡¶¨‡¶π‡ßÅ‡¶∞‡ßÇ‡¶™‡¶§‡¶æ)
php<?php
namespace App\Services\Shipping;


// Interface defines contract
interface ShippingProvider
{
    public function calculateCost(Order $order): float;
    public function estimateDelivery(Order $order): \Carbon\Carbon;
    public function createShipment(Order $order): Shipment;
}


// Different implementations
class FedExShipping implements ShippingProvider
{
    public function calculateCost(Order $order): float
    {
        $weight = $order->getTotalWeight();
        $distance = $this->calculateDistance($order->shippingAddress);
        
        return $weight * 0.5 + $distance * 0.1 + 5.00;
    }


    public function estimateDelivery(Order $order): \Carbon\Carbon
    {
        return now()->addDays(3);
    }


    public function createShipment(Order $order): Shipment
    {
        // FedEx API call
    }
}


class DHLShipping implements ShippingProvider
{
    public function calculateCost(Order $order): float
    {
        // Different calculation logic
        return $order->getTotalWeight() * 0.6 + 10.00;
    }


    public function estimateDelivery(Order $order): \Carbon\Carbon
    {
        return now()->addDays(2); // Faster delivery
    }


    public function createShipment(Order $order): Shipment
    {
        // DHL API call
    }
}


class LocalDelivery implements ShippingProvider
{
    public function calculateCost(Order $order): float
    {
        return 5.00; // Flat rate
    }


    public function estimateDelivery(Order $order): \Carbon\Carbon
    {
        return now()->addDay(); // Same-day or next-day
    }


    public function createShipment(Order $order): Shipment
    {
        // Local delivery system
    }
}


// Usage - Polymorphism in action
class ShippingService
{
    public function __construct(
        private ShippingProvider $provider // Can accept ANY implementation
    ) {}


    public function shipOrder(Order $order): void
    {
        // Works with ANY shipping provider
        $cost = $this->provider->calculateCost($order);
        $estimatedDelivery = $this->provider->estimateDelivery($order);
        $shipment = $this->provider->createShipment($order);


        $order->update([
            'shipping_cost' => $cost,
            'estimated_delivery' => $estimatedDelivery,
        ]);
    }
}


// Easy to switch providers
$service = new ShippingService(new FedExShipping());
$service = new ShippingService(new DHLShipping());
$service = new ShippingService(new LocalDelivery());
Abstraction (‡¶¨‡¶ø‡¶Æ‡ßÇ‡¶∞‡ßç‡¶§‡¶§‡¶æ)
php<?php
namespace App\Services\Notification;


// Abstract interface - hides complexity
interface NotificationChannel
{
    public function send(User $user, string $message): bool;
}


// Concrete implementations
class EmailNotification implements NotificationChannel
{
    public function send(User $user, string $message): bool
    {
        // Complex email sending logic hidden
        Mail::to($user->email)->send(new GenericNotification($message));
        return true;
    }
}


class SMSNotification implements NotificationChannel
{
    public function send(User $user, string $message): bool
    {
        // Complex SMS logic hidden
        $this->twilioClient->messages->create($user->phone, [
            'body' => $message,
        ]);
        return true;
    }
}


class PushNotification implements NotificationChannel
{
    public function send(User $user, string $message): bool
    {
        // Complex push notification logic hidden
        return true;
    }
}


// Service that uses abstraction
class NotificationService
{
    private array $channels = [];


    public function addChannel(NotificationChannel $channel): void
    {
        $this->channels[] = $channel;
    }


    public function notifyUser(User $user, string $message): void
    {
        // User doesn't need to know HOW notifications are sent
        foreach ($this->channels as $channel) {
            $channel->send($user, $message);
        }
    }
}


// Usage - complexity is hidden
$notifier = new NotificationService();
$notifier->addChannel(new EmailNotification());
$notifier->addChannel(new SMSNotification());
$notifier->addChannel(new PushNotification());


$notifier->notifyUser($user, 'Your order has been shipped!');
    public function createShipment(Order $order): Shipment
    {
        // Local delivery system
    }
}


// Usage - Polymorphism in action
class ShippingService
{
    public function __construct(
        private ShippingProvider $provider // Can accept ANY implementation
    ) {}


    public function shipOrder(Order $order): void
    {
        // Works with ANY shipping provider
        $cost = $this->provider->calculateCost($order);
        $estimatedDelivery = $this->provider->estimateDelivery($order);
        $shipment = $this->provider->createShipment($order);


        $order->update([
            'shipping_cost' => $cost,
            'estimated_delivery' => $estimatedDelivery,
        ]);
    }
}


// Easy to switch providers
$service = new ShippingService(new FedExShipping());
$service = new ShippingService(new DHLShipping());
$service = new ShippingService(new LocalDelivery());
Abstraction (‡¶¨‡¶ø‡¶Æ‡ßÇ‡¶∞‡ßç‡¶§‡¶§‡¶æ)
php
<?php
namespace App\Services\Notification;


// Abstract interface - hides complexity
interface NotificationChannel
{
    public function send(User $user, string $message): bool;
}


// Concrete implementations
class EmailNotification implements NotificationChannel
{
    public function send(User $user, string $message): bool
    {
        // Complex email sending logic hidden
        Mail::to($user->email)->send(new GenericNotification($message));
        return true;
    }
}


class SMSNotification implements NotificationChannel
{
    public function send(User $user, string $message): bool
    {
        // Complex SMS logic hidden
        $this->twilioClient->messages->create($user->phone, [
            'body' => $message,
        ]);
        return true;
    }
}


class PushNotification implements NotificationChannel
{
    public function send(User $user, string $message): bool
    {
        // Complex push notification logic hidden
        return true;
    }
}


// Service that uses abstraction
class NotificationService
{
    private array $channels = [];


    public function addChannel(NotificationChannel $channel): void
    {
        $this->channels[] = $channel;
    }


    public function notifyUser(User $user, string $message): void
    {
        // User doesn't need to know HOW notifications are sent
        foreach ($this->channels as $channel) {
            $channel->send($user, $message);
        }
    }
}


// Usage - complexity is hidden
$notifier = new NotificationService();
$notifier->addChannel(new EmailNotification());
$notifier->addChannel(new SMSNotification());
$notifier->addChannel(new PushNotification());


$notifier->notifyUser($user, 'Your order has been shipped!');
3. SOLID PRINCIPLES
3.1 Single Responsibility Principle (SRP)
<?php
// ‚ùå BAD - Class doing too many things


class OrderProcessor
{
    public function processOrder($orderData)
    {
        // Validation
        if (empty($orderData['items'])) {
            throw new Exception('No items');
        }


        // Calculate totals
        $total = 0;
        foreach ($orderData['items'] as $item) {
            $total += $item['price'] * $item['quantity'];
        }


        // Save to database
        DB::insert('orders', ['total' => $total]);


        // Send email
        mail($orderData['email'], 'Order Confirmed', 'Your order is confirmed');


        // Process payment
        $stripe = new \Stripe\StripeClient('key');
        $stripe->charges->create(['amount' => $total]);


        // Update inventory
        foreach ($orderData['items'] as $item) {
            DB::update('products', ['stock' => DB::raw('stock - ' . $item['quantity'])]);
        }
    }
}


// ‚úÖ GOOD - Each class has ONE responsibility


// 1. Order Validation
class OrderValidator
{
    public function validate(array $orderData): void
    {
        if (empty($orderData['items'])) {
            throw new ValidationException('Order must have at least one item');
        }


        foreach ($orderData['items'] as $item) {
            if ($item['quantity'] <= 0) {
                throw new ValidationException('Invalid quantity');
            }
        }
    }
}


// 2. Order Calculation
class OrderCalculator
{
    public function calculateTotal(array $items): float
    {
        return array_reduce($items, function ($total, $item) {
            return $total + ($item['price'] * $item['quantity']);
        }, 0);
    }


    public function calculateTax(float $subtotal): float
    {
        return $subtotal * 0.10;
    }


    public function calculateShipping(float $weight): float
    {
        return $weight * 0.5;
    }
}


// 3. Order Repository
class OrderRepository
{
    public function create(Order $order): Order
    {
        return Order::create($order->toArray());
    }


    public function update(Order $order): Order
    {
        $order->save();
        return $order;
    }
}


// 4. Payment Processor
class PaymentProcessor
{
    public function __construct(
        private PaymentGateway $gateway
    ) {}


    public function process(Order $order): PaymentResult
    {
        return $this->gateway->charge($order->total);
    }
}


// 5. Email Service
class OrderEmailService
{
    public function sendConfirmation(Order $order): void
    {
        Mail::to($order->customer)
            ->send(new OrderConfirmation($order));
    }
}


// 6. Inventory Manager
class InventoryManager
{
    public function decreaseStock(OrderItem $item): void
    {
        $product = $item->product;
        $product->decrement('stock_quantity', $item->quantity);
    }
}


// Orchestrator - coordinates all services
class OrderService
{
    public function __construct(
        private OrderValidator $validator,
        private OrderCalculator $calculator,
        private OrderRepository $repository,
        private PaymentProcessor $payment,
        private OrderEmailService $email,
        private InventoryManager $inventory
    ) {}


    public function createOrder(array $orderData): Order
    {
        // Each service does ONE thing
        $this->validator->validate($orderData);
        
        $order = new Order();
        $order->subtotal = $this->calculator->calculateTotal($orderData['items']);
        $order->tax = $this->calculator->calculateTax($order->subtotal);
        $order->total = $order->subtotal + $order->tax;
        
        $order = $this->repository->create($order);
        
        $this->payment->process($order);
        
        foreach ($order->items as $item) {
            $this->inventory->decreaseStock($item);
        }
        
        $this->email->sendConfirmation($order);
        
        return $order;
    }
}
3.2 Open/Closed Principle (OCP)
<?php
// Open for extension, Closed for modification


// ‚ùå BAD - Need to modify class to add new discount types
class DiscountCalculator
{
    public function calculate(Order $order, string $type): float
    {
        if ($type === 'percentage') {
            return $order->subtotal * 0.10;
        } elseif ($type === 'fixed') {
            return 50.00;
        } elseif ($type === 'buy_one_get_one') {
            // Complex logic
        }
        // Need to modify THIS class to add new types ‚ùå
    }
}


// ‚úÖ GOOD - Open for extension, closed for modification
interface DiscountStrategy
{
    public function calculate(Order $order): float;
}


class PercentageDiscount implements DiscountStrategy
{
    public function __construct(
        private float $percentage
    ) {}


    public function calculate(Order $order): float
    {
        return $order->subtotal * ($this->percentage / 100);
    }
}


class FixedAmountDiscount implements DiscountStrategy
{
    public function __construct(
        private float $amount
    ) {}


    public function calculate(Order $order): float
    {
        return min($this->amount, $order->subtotal);
    }
}


class BuyOneGetOneDiscount implements DiscountStrategy
{
    public function calculate(Order $order): float
    {
        $discount = 0;
        foreach ($order->items as $item) {
            if ($item->quantity >= 2) {
                $discount += $item->unit_price * floor($item->quantity / 2);
            }
        }
        return $discount;
    }
}


// NEW discount type - just add new class, no modification needed ‚úÖ
class FirstOrderDiscount implements DiscountStrategy
{
    public function calculate(Order $order): float
    {
        if ($order->customer->orders()->count() === 1) {
            return $order->subtotal * 0.20;
        }
        return 0;
    }
}


// Usage
class DiscountService
{
    public function applyDiscount(Order $order, DiscountStrategy $strategy): void
    {
        $discount = $strategy->calculate($order);
        $order->discount = $discount;
        $order->total = $order->subtotal - $discount;
    }
}


// Easy to add new discounts without modifying existing code
$service = new DiscountService();
$service->applyDiscount($order, new PercentageDiscount(10));
$service->applyDiscount($order, new FixedAmountDiscount(50));
$service->applyDiscount($order, new BuyOneGetOneDiscount());
$service->applyDiscount($order, new FirstOrderDiscount());


3.3 Liskov Substitution Principle (LSP)


<?php
// Subtypes must be substitutable for their base types


// ‚úÖ GOOD - Proper substitution
interface PaymentMethod
{
    public function charge(float $amount): PaymentResult;
    public function refund(float $amount): RefundResult;
}


class CreditCardPayment implements PaymentMethod
{
    public function charge(float $amount): PaymentResult
    {
        // Credit card charging logic
        return new PaymentResult(true, 'txn_123');
    }


    public function refund(float $amount): RefundResult
    {
        // Credit card refund logic
        return new RefundResult(true, 'ref_123');
    }
}


class PayPalPayment implements PaymentMethod
{
    public function charge(float $amount): PaymentResult
    {
        // PayPal charging logic
        return new PaymentResult(true, 'pp_123');
    }


    public function refund(float $amount): RefundResult
    {
        // PayPal refund logic
        return new RefundResult(true, 'pp_ref_123');
    }
}


// ‚ùå BAD - Violates LSP
class CashOnDeliveryPayment implements PaymentMethod
{
    public function charge(float $amount): PaymentResult
    {
        // Can't charge cash on delivery upfront!
        throw new \Exception('Cannot charge COD payment');
    }


    public function refund(float $amount): RefundResult
    {
        // How do you refund cash that wasn't charged?
        throw new \Exception('Cannot refund COD payment');
    }
}


// ‚úÖ BETTER - Separate interfaces for different behaviors
interface OnlinePaymentMethod
{
    public function charge(float $amount): PaymentResult;
    public function refund(float $amount): RefundResult;
}


interface OfflinePaymentMethod
{
    public function markAsPaid(float $amount): void;
    public function confirmDelivery(): void;
}


class CashOnDelivery implements OfflinePaymentMethod
{
    public function markAsPaid(float $amount): void
    {
        // Mark order as paid when delivered
    }


    public function confirmDelivery(): void
    {
        // Delivery person confirms
    }
}


3.4 Interface Segregation Principle (ISP)


<?php
// Clients should not be forced to depend on interfaces they don't use


// ‚ùå BAD - Fat interface
interface Worker
{
    public function work(): void;
    public function eat(): void;
    public function sleep(): void;
    public function getSalary(): float;
    public function attendMeeting(): void;
}


// Robot doesn't eat or sleep but forced to implement
class Robot implements Worker
{
    public function work(): void { /* Work */ }
    public function eat(): void { /* ??? */ }
    public function sleep(): void { /* ??? */ }
    public function getSalary(): float { return 0; /* ??? */ }
    public function attendMeeting(): void { /* ??? */ }
}


// ‚úÖ GOOD - Segregated interfaces
interface Workable
{
    public function work(): void;
}


interface Eatable
{
    public function eat(): void;
}


interface Sleepable
{
    public function sleep(): void;
}


interface Payable
{
    public function getSalary(): float;
}


// Human implements what makes sense
class Human implements Workable, Eatable, Sleepable, Payable
{
    public function work(): void { /* Work */ }
    public function eat(): void { /* Eat */ }
    public function sleep(): void { /* Sleep */ }
    public function getSalary(): float { return 5000; }
}


// Robot only implements what makes sense
class Robot implements Workable
{
    public function work(): void { /* Work 24/7 */ }
}


// E-commerce example
// ‚ùå BAD
interface Product
{
    public function getName(): string;
    public function getPrice(): float;
    public function getWeight(): float;
    public function getColor(): string;
    public function getSize(): string;
    public function getBatteryLife(): int;
}


// Digital product doesn't have weight, color, size
class EBook implements Product
{
    public function getWeight(): float { return 0; /* ??? */ }
    public function getColor(): string { return ''; /* ??? */ }
    public function getSize(): string { return ''; /* ??? */ }
    public function getBatteryLife(): int { return 0; /* ??? */ }
}


// ‚úÖ GOOD
interface BaseProduct
{
    public function getName(): string;
    public function getPrice(): float;
}


interface PhysicalProduct extends BaseProduct
{
    public function getWeight(): float;
    public function getDimensions(): array;
}


interface ClothingProduct extends PhysicalProduct
{
    public function getColor(): string;
    public function getSize(): string;
}


interface ElectronicProduct extends PhysicalProduct
{
    public function getBatteryLife(): int;
    public function getWarranty(): int;
}


interface DigitalProduct extends BaseProduct
{
    public function getFileSize(): int;
    public function getFormat(): string;
}


// Now each product only implements what it needs
class EBook implements DigitalProduct
{
    public function getName(): string { /* */ }
    public function getPrice(): float { /* */ }
    public function getFileSize(): int { /* */ }
    public function getFormat(): string { return 'PDF'; }
}


class Laptop implements ElectronicProduct
{
    // Only implements relevant methods
}


3.5 Dependency Inversion Principle (DIP)


<?php
// Depend on abstractions, not concretions


// ‚ùå BAD - High-level module depends on low-level module
class OrderService
{
    private MySQLOrderRepository $repository; // Concrete dependency


    public function __construct()
    {
        $this->repository = new MySQLOrderRepository(); // Tightly coupled
    }


    public function createOrder(array $data): Order
    {
        return $this->repository->save($data);
    }
}


// Can't switch to PostgreSQL or MongoDB without changing OrderService ‚ùå


// ‚úÖ GOOD - Depend on abstraction
interface OrderRepositoryInterface
{
    public function save(array $data): Order;
    public function find(int $id): ?Order;
    public function all(): array;
}


// Concrete implementations
class MySQLOrderRepository implements OrderRepositoryInterface
{
    public function save(array $data): Order
    {
        // MySQL specific logic
    }


    public function find(int $id): ?Order
    {
        return Order::find($id);
    }


    public function all(): array
    {
        return Order::all()->toArray();
    }
}


class MongoDBOrderRepository implements OrderRepositoryInterface
{
    public function save(array $data): Order
    {
        // MongoDB specific logic
    }


    public function find(int $id): ?Order
    {
        // MongoDB query
    }


    public function all(): array
    {
        // MongoDB query
    }
}


// High-level module depends on abstraction
class OrderService
{
    public function __construct(
        private OrderRepositoryInterface $repository // Abstract dependency
    ) {}


    public function createOrder(array $data): Order
    {
        return $this->repository->save($data);
    }
}


// Dependency injection in service provider
class AppServiceProvider extends ServiceProvider
{
    public function register(): void
    {
        // Easy to switch implementations
        $this->app->bind(
            OrderRepositoryInterface::class,
            MySQLOrderRepository::class
            // or MongoDBOrderRepository::class
        );
    }
}


// Now can easily switch database without touching OrderService ‚úÖ
4. REPOSITORY PATTERN
4.1 What is Repository Pattern?
  

**5. SERVICE LAYER PATTERN** 
**5.1 What is Service Layer?**


6. OBSERVER PATTERN
6.1 Laravel Events & Listeners (Observer Pattern)
php
<?php
// app/Events/OrderPlaced.php


namespace App\Events;


use App\Models\Order;
use Illuminate\Broadcasting\InteractsWithSockets;
use Illuminate\Foundation\Events\Dispatchable;
use Illuminate\Queue\SerializesModels;


class OrderPlaced
{
    use Dispatchable, InteractsWithSockets, SerializesModels;


    public function __construct(
        public Order $order
    ) {}
}
php
<?php
// app/Listeners/SendOrderConfirmationEmail.php


namespace App\Listeners;


use App\Events\OrderPlaced;
use App\Mail\OrderConfirmation;
use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Mail;


class SendOrderConfirmationEmail
{
    public function handle(OrderPlaced $event): void
    {
        Mail::to($event->order->customer->email)
            ->send(new OrderConfirmation($event->order));
    }
}
php
<?php
// app/Listeners/UpdateInventory.php


namespace App\Listeners;


use App\Events\OrderPlaced;
use App\Services\Inventory\InventoryService;


class UpdateInventory
{
    public function __construct(
        private InventoryService $inventoryService
    ) {}


    public function handle(OrderPlaced $event): void
    {
        foreach ($event->order->items as $item) {
            $this->inventoryService->decreaseStock(
                $item->product_id,
                $item->quantity
            );
        }
    }
}
<?php
// app/Listeners/CreateCommissionRecords.php


namespace App\Listeners;


use App\Events\OrderPlaced;


class CreateCommissionRecords
{
    public function handle(OrderPlaced $event): void
    {
        foreach ($event->order->items as $item) {
            $commissionAmount = $item->total_price * ($item->commission_rate / 100);
            $gatewayFee = $item->total_price * 0.029 + 0.30;
            $vendorPayout = $item->total_price - $commissionAmount - $gatewayFee;


            $event->order->commissions()->create([
                'vendor_id' => $item->vendor_id,
                'order_item_id' => $item->id,
                'order_amount' => $item->total_price,
                'commission_rate' => $item->commission_rate,
                'commission_amount' => $commissionAmount,
                'gateway_fee' => $gatewayFee,
                'vendor_payout' => $vendorPayout,
                'status' => 'pending',
            ]);
        }
    }
}
6.2 Register Event Listeners
php
<?php
// app/Providers/EventServiceProvider.php


namespace App\Providers;


use Illuminate\Foundation\Support\Providers\EventServiceProvider as ServiceProvider;


class EventServiceProvider extends ServiceProvider
{
    protected $listen = [
        \App\Events\OrderPlaced::class => [
            \App\Listeners\SendOrderConfirmationEmail::class,
            \App\Listeners\UpdateInventory::class,
            \App\Listeners\CreateCommissionRecords::class,
            \App\Listeners\NotifyVendor::class,
        ],


        \App\Events\OrderShipped::class => [
            \App\Listeners\SendShippingNotification::class,
            \App\Listeners\UpdateOrderStatus::class,
        ],


        \App\Events\PaymentReceived::class => [
            \App\Listeners\ReleaseCommission::class,
            \App\Listeners\SendPaymentReceipt::class,
        ],
    ];
}
6.3 Trigger Event
php
<?php
// In OrderService or Controller


use App\Events\OrderPlaced;


public function createOrder(User $user, array $orderData): Order
{
    $order = // ... create order logic


    // Trigger event - all listeners will be executed
    event(new OrderPlaced($order));


    return $order;
}
FACTORY PATTERN
7.1 Payment Gateway Factory
<?php
// app/Factories/PaymentGatewayFactory.php


namespace App\Factories;


use App\Services\Payment\PaymentGatewayInterface;
use App\Services\Payment\StripePaymentGateway;
use App\Services\Payment\PayPalPaymentGateway;
use App\Services\Payment\SSLCommerzGateway;
use App\Services\Payment\CashOnDeliveryGateway;


class PaymentGatewayFactory
{
    /**
     * Create payment gateway instance based on payment method
     */
    public static function create(string $paymentMethod): PaymentGatewayInterface
    {
        return match($paymentMethod) {
            'stripe_card' => app(StripePaymentGateway::class),
            'paypal' => app(PayPalPaymentGateway::class),
            'sslcommerz' => app(SSLCommerzGateway::class),
            'cash_on_delivery' => app(CashOnDeliveryGateway::class),
            default => throw new \InvalidArgumentException("Unsupported payment method: {$paymentMethod}"),
        };
    }


    /**
     * Get all available payment methods
     */
    public static function getAvailableMethods(): array
    {
        return [
            'stripe_card' => [
                'name' => 'Credit/Debit Card',
                'description' => 'Pay securely with Visa, Mastercard, or American Express',
                'icon' => 'credit-card',
                'enabled' => config('services.stripe.enabled', true),
            ],
            'paypal' => [
                'name' => 'PayPal',
                'description' => 'Pay with your PayPal account',
                'icon' => 'paypal',
                'enabled' => config('services.paypal.enabled', true),
            ],
            'sslcommerz' => [
                'name' => 'Mobile Banking / bKash',
                'description' => 'Pay with bKash, Nagad, Rocket, or card',
                'icon' => 'mobile',
                'enabled' => config('services.sslcommerz.enabled', true),
            ],
