9. SPARKLINES (Micro Charts):
‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ


Used inline with text or in tables:


Revenue: $125,450  [‚ñÅ‚ñÇ‚ñÉ‚ñÖ‚ñÜ‚ñà‚ñá‚ñÜ‚ñÖ‚ñÑ] ‚Üë +12.5%
Orders:  1,234     [‚ñÉ‚ñÑ‚ñÖ‚ñÑ‚ñÉ‚ñÖ‚ñÜ‚ñÖ‚ñÑ‚ñÉ] ‚Üë +8.3%
Customers: 5,678   [‚ñÇ‚ñÉ‚ñÑ‚ñÖ‚ñÜ‚ñá‚ñà‚ñÜ‚ñÖ‚ñÑ] ‚Üë +15.2%


Specifications:
- Width: 60-100px
- Height: 20-30px
- No axes or labels
- Simple line or bar
- Shows trend at a glance
- Optional dot for current value


‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ
CHART INTERACTIONS:
‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ


Common Interactions:
- Hover: Highlight + tooltip
- Click: Drill down / filter
- Legend click: Show/hide series
- Drag: Pan (for time series)
- Scroll: Zoom in/out
- Pinch: Zoom (touch devices)


Controls:
- Date range picker
- Granularity selector (Daily/Weekly/Monthly)
- Export button (PNG, PDF, CSV)
- Fullscreen toggle
- Data table view toggle


CHART EXPORT:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
Formats:
- PNG image (for presentations)
- PDF (for reports)
- CSV data (for analysis)
- Excel (with formatting)


CHART ACCESSIBILITY:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
- Provide data table alternative
- Keyboard navigation support
- Screen reader descriptions
- High contrast mode support
- Color blind friendly palettes
- Text alternatives for visual data


RESPONSIVE CHARTS:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
Desktop (>1024px):
- Full size
- All labels visible
- Detailed tooltips


Tablet (768px-1024px):
- Slightly smaller
- Simplified labels
- Shorter time ranges


Mobile (<768px):
- Compact view
- Minimal labels
- Swipe to see more data
- Simplified chart types
- Consider card-based metric display instead


CHART LOADING STATE:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê
‚îÇ Chart Title                                                             ‚îÇ
‚îÇ ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                          [‚è≥]                                            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                     Loading chart data...                               ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò


CHART ERROR STATE:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê
‚îÇ Chart Title                                                             ‚îÇ
‚îÇ ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                          ‚ö†Ô∏è                                              ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                   Failed to load chart                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                      [Retry]                                            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò


CHART EMPTY STATE:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê
‚îÇ Chart Title                                                             ‚îÇ
‚îÇ ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                          üìä                                              ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                    No data available                                    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ              Try selecting a different date range                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò


BEST PRACTICES:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
‚úì Choose appropriate chart type for data
‚úì Use consistent colors across dashboard
‚úì Provide clear labels and legends
‚úì Keep it simple (don't overcomplicate)
‚úì Show trends, not just numbers
‚úì Make interactive (hover, click, zoom)
‚úì Provide export options
‚úì Ensure accessibility
‚úì Optimize for performance
‚úì Show loading states


‚úó Don't use 3D charts (hard to read)
‚úó Don't use too many colors
‚úó Don't forget mobile optimization
‚úó Don't show irrelevant precision
‚úó Don't clutter with unnecessary elements


4. COLOR SCHEME & BRANDING


‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê
‚îÇ                    COMPLETE COLOR PALETTE                                ‚îÇ
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò


PRIMARY COLORS:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


Blue (Brand Primary):
- 50:  #EFF6FF
- 100: #DBEAFE
- 200: #BFDBFE
- 300: #93C5FD
- 400: #60A5FA
- 500: #3B82F6 ‚Üê Main brand color
- 600: #2563EB
- 700: #1D4ED8
- 800: #1E40AF
- 900: #1E3A8A


Usage:
- Primary buttons
- Links
- Active states
- Highlights
- Charts (primary)


SEMANTIC COLORS:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


Success (Green):
- 50:  #ECFDF5
- 100: #D1FAE5
- 200: #A7F3D0
- 300: #6EE7B7
- 400: #34D399
- 500: #10B981 ‚Üê Main success color
- 600: #059669
- 700: #047857
- 800: #065F46
- 900: #064E3B


Usage:
- Success messages
- Positive metrics (revenue up)
- Approved status
- Active/online indicators
- Charts (positive data)


Warning (Amber):
- 50:  #FFFBEB
- 100: #FEF3C7
- 200: #FDE68A
- 300: #FCD34D
- 400: #FBBF24
- 500: #F59E0B ‚Üê Main warning color
- 600: #D97706
- 700: #B45309
- 800: #92400E
- 900: #78350F


Usage:
- Warning messages
- Pending status
- Caution indicators
- Low stock alerts
- Charts (caution data)


Error (Red):
- 50:  #FEF2F2
- 100: #FEE2E2
- 200: #FECACA
- 300: #FCA5A5
- 400: #F87171
- 500: #EF4444 ‚Üê Main error color
- 600: #DC2626
- 700: #B91C1C
- 800: #991B1B
- 900: #7F1D1D


Usage:
- Error messages
- Destructive actions (delete)
- Failed status
- Negative metrics (revenue down)
- Charts (negative data)


Info (Cyan):
- 500: #06B6D4 ‚Üê Info color


NEUTRAL COLORS (Gray):
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
- 50:  #F9FAFB ‚Üê Page backgrounds
- 100: #F3F4F6 ‚Üê Disabled states
- 200: #E5E7EB ‚Üê Borders, dividers
- 300: #D1D5DB ‚Üê Input borders
- 400: #9CA3AF ‚Üê Placeholders
- 500: #6B7280 ‚Üê Secondary text
- 600: #4B5563 ‚Üê Body text
- 700: #374151 ‚Üê Headings
- 800: #1F2937 ‚Üê Dark text
- 900: #111827 ‚Üê Darkest text


WHITE & BLACK:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
- White: #FFFFFF
- Black: #000000


ACCENT COLORS (Additional):
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
Purple:
- 500: #8B5CF6
Usage: Charts, badges, premium features


Pink:
- 500: #EC4899
Usage: Charts, highlights


Teal:
- 500: #14B8A6
Usage: Charts, secondary CTAs


Orange:
- 500: #F97316
Usage: Hot/trending indicators


CATEGORY COLORS:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
Electronics: #3B82F6 (Blue)
Fashion:     #EC4899 (Pink)
Home:        #10B981 (Green)
Sports:      #F97316 (Orange)
Books:       #8B5CF6 (Purple)
Food:        #F59E0B (Amber)


TEXT COLORS:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
Primary:   #111827 (Gray 900) - Main content
Secondary: #6B7280 (Gray 500) - Supporting text
Tertiary:  #9CA3AF (Gray 400) - Hints, labels
Disabled:  #D1D5DB (Gray 300) - Disabled text
Inverse:   #FFFFFF (White) - On dark backgrounds


BACKGROUND COLORS:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
Page:      #F9FAFB (Gray 50)
Card:      #FFFFFF (White)
Hover:     #F3F4F6 (Gray 100)
Selected:  #EFF6FF (Blue 50)
Disabled:  #F3F4F6 (Gray 100)


BORDER COLORS:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
Default:   #E5E7EB (Gray 200)
Focus:     #3B82F6 (Blue 500)
Error:     #EF4444 (Red 500)
Success:   #10B981 (Green 500)


SHADOW COLORS:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
Small:  0 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)
Medium: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)
Large:  0 10px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)
XLarge: 0 20px 25px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15)


OVERLAY COLORS:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
Modal backdrop: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)
Hover overlay:  rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)
Loading:        rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8)


COLOR USAGE GUIDELINES:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


‚úì DO:
- Use primary blue for main actions
- Use semantic colors appropriately
- Maintain sufficient contrast (WCAG AA: 4.5:1)
- Use neutral grays for text hierarchy
- Be consistent with color meanings


‚úó DON'T:
- Use color alone to convey information
- Mix warm and cool grays
- Use pure black (#000000) for text
- Over-saturate colors
- Ignore accessibility


DARK MODE (Optional):
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
Background: #111827 (Gray 900)
Surface:    #1F2937 (Gray 800)
Text:       #F9FAFB (Gray 50)
Border:     #374151 (Gray 700)


ACCESSIBILITY:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
All color combinations meet WCAG AA standards:
- Normal text: 4.5:1 contrast ratio
- Large text: 3:1 contrast ratio
- Interactive elements: Clear visual feedback
- Never rely on color alone


5. RESPONSIVE DESIGN STRATEGY


‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê
‚îÇ                    RESPONSIVE BREAKPOINTS                                ‚îÇ
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò


BREAKPOINT SYSTEM:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


Mobile Small (xs):    320px - 479px
Mobile Large (sm):    480px - 767px
Tablet (md):          768px - 1023px
Laptop (lg):          1024px - 1279px
Desktop (xl):         1280px - 1535px
Large Desktop (2xl):  1536px+


Primary Breakpoints (Mobile-First):
- Base:    < 768px  (Mobile)
- md:      768px    (Tablet)
- lg:      1024px   (Laptop)
- xl:      1280px   (Desktop)
- 2xl:     1536px   (Large Desktop)


‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ
MOBILE (< 768px):
‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ

‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê

Mobile Specifications:
- No sidebar (hamburger menu instead)
- Header height: 56px
- Touch targets: Min 44x44px
- Padding: 16px (left/right)
- Font size: Base 14px (increased for readability)
- Buttons: Full width or large
- Tables: Card view instead
- Modals: Full screen or bottom sheet
- Navigation: Hamburger menu or bottom nav

MOBILE GESTURES:
- Swipe left/right: Navigate between items
- Swipe down: Refresh (pull-to-refresh)
- Long press: Show context menu
- Pinch: Zoom (images, charts)
- Tap: Select/open
- Double tap: Quick action

Tablet Specifications:
- Collapsible sidebar (default: visible)
- Header height: 64px
- Sidebar width: 240px (collapsed: 64px - icons only)
- Touch targets: 44x44px
- Padding: 24px
- Font size: Base 14px
- Grid: 2 columns
- Tables: Show important columns only

- Fixed sidebar (260px)

- Centered content
- Prevent overstretching
- Grid: 4-6 columns
- Extra whitespace for comfort


‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ
RESPONSIVE PATTERNS:
‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ


GRID SYSTEM:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
Mobile:    1 column  (100%)
Tablet:    2 columns (50% each)
Laptop:    3 columns (33.33% each)
Desktop:   4 columns (25% each)
XL:        6 columns (16.66% each)


TYPOGRAPHY SCALING:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
Mobile:
- H1: 24px
- H2: 20px
- H3: 18px
- Body: 14px


Tablet:
- H1: 28px
- H2: 22px
- H3: 18px
- Body: 14px


Desktop:
- H1: 32px
- H2: 24px
- H3: 20px
- Body: 14px


SPACING SCALE:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
Mobile:  16px base unit
Tablet:  20px base unit
Desktop: 24px base unit


COMPONENT ADAPTATION:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


Buttons:
- Mobile: Full width or large (min 48px height)
- Tablet: Auto width (min 40px height)
- Desktop: Auto width (40px height)


Cards:
- Mobile: Full width, stack vertically
- Tablet: 2 per row
- Desktop: 3-4 per row


Tables:
- Mobile: Card view (vertical)
- Tablet: Table view (limited columns)
- Desktop: Full table (all columns)


Modals:
- Mobile: Full screen
- Tablet: 90vw max
- Desktop: Fixed width (600-800px)


Forms:
- Mobile: 1 column
- Tablet: Mixed (1-2 columns)
- Desktop: 2-3 columns


Charts:
- Mobile: Simplified, stacked
- Tablet: Standard
- Desktop: Full featured


TOUCH VS MOUSE:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
Touch (Mobile/Tablet):
- Larger tap targets (44x44px min)
- Swipe gestures
- Pull to refresh
- Long press menus
- No hover states (tap to activate)


Mouse (Desktop):
- Smaller click targets (32x32px)
- Hover states
- Context menus (right-click)
- Tooltips on hover
- Keyboard shortcuts


PERFORMANCE OPTIMIZATION:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
Mobile:
- Lazy load images
- Paginate data (10-20 items)
- Reduce animations
- Simplified charts
- Progressive enhancement


Desktop:
- Load more data
- Rich animations
- Complex charts
- Advanced features


TESTING CHECKLIST:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
‚òê Test on actual devices (not just browser resize)
‚òê Test portrait and landscape
‚òê Test touch interactions
‚òê Test with slow network
‚òê Test accessibility (screen readers, keyboard)
‚òê Test different browsers (Chrome, Safari, Firefox)
‚òê Test with content variations (long names, no data, etc.)


6. COMPLETE USER FLOW DIAGRAMS


‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê
‚îÇ                    MAJOR USER FLOWS                                      ‚îÇ
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò


‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ

‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê

        ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¨‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò

         ‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¥‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê
         ‚îÇ         ‚îÇ
      Reject    Approve
         ‚îÇ         ‚îÇ

         ‚îÇ   ‚îÇ Confirmation ‚îÇ

       ‚îÇ        ‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê

7. TYPOGRAPHY SYSTEM


‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê
‚îÇ                         TYPOGRAPHY SYSTEM                                ‚îÇ
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò


FONT FAMILIES:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


Primary Font (UI):
- Family: Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, 
          "Helvetica Neue", Arial, sans-serif
- Use: All UI elements, body text, buttons, forms
- Characteristics: Clean, readable, excellent at small sizes
- Variable font: Supports weight 100-900


Monospace Font (Code/Data):
- Family: "Fira Code", "JetBrains Mono", Consolas, Monaco, monospace
- Use: SKU codes, order numbers, JSON data, logs
- Characteristics: Fixed width, distinguishable characters


Alternative (Headlines - Optional):
- Family: "Plus Jakarta Sans", "Inter", sans-serif
- Use: Page titles, marketing content
- Characteristics: Slightly warmer, friendly


FONT WEIGHT SCALE:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
- Thin:       100 (Rarely used)
- ExtraLight: 200 (Rarely used)
- Light:      300 (Secondary text)
- Regular:    400 (Body text, default)
- Medium:     500 (Emphasis, labels)
- SemiBold:   600 (Headings, buttons)
- Bold:       700 (Strong emphasis)
- ExtraBold:  800 (Display text)
- Black:      900 (Rarely used)


Common Weights:
- Body text: 400
- Buttons: 600
- Headings: 600-700
- Labels: 500
- Numbers: 600 (tabular data)


FONT SIZE SCALE:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


Display Sizes (Rare):
- 2xl: 60px / 3.75rem (Line height: 72px / 1.2)
- xl:  48px / 3rem    (Line height: 56px / 1.17)


Heading Sizes:
- h1: 32px / 2rem     (Line height: 40px / 1.25) - Page titles
- h2: 24px / 1.5rem   (Line height: 32px / 1.33) - Section titles
- h3: 20px / 1.25rem  (Line height: 28px / 1.4)  - Subsections
- h4: 18px / 1.125rem (Line height: 28px / 1.56) - Card titles
- h5: 16px / 1rem     (Line height: 24px / 1.5)  - Small headings
- h6: 14px / 0.875rem (Line height: 20px / 1.43) - Tiny headings


Body Sizes:
- lg:   18px / 1.125rem (Line height: 28px / 1.56) - Large body
- base: 14px / 0.875rem (Line height: 20px / 1.43) - Default body
- sm:   13px / 0.8125rem (Line height: 18px / 1.38) - Small text
- xs:   12px / 0.75rem  (Line height: 16px / 1.33) - Tiny text


TYPOGRAPHY HIERARCHY:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


Page Title (H1):
‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê

Body Text:
‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê
‚îÇ This is regular body text used for         ‚Üê 14px, Weight 400, #374151 ‚îÇ
‚îÇ descriptions and longer content.                                        ‚îÇ
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò


Small Text:

Label Text:
‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê

‚îÇ [Input field here]                                                      ‚îÇ
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò


LINE HEIGHT:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
Body text: 1.5 (150%)
Headings: 1.2-1.4 (tighter)
Buttons: 1 (single line)
Dense tables: 1.43 (compact)


LETTER SPACING:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
Default: 0 (normal)
Headings: -0.01em to -0.02em (tighter, optional)
All caps: 0.05em (wider, improves readability)
Buttons: 0 (normal)


TEXT STYLES (CSS Classes):
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


.text-display-2xl {
  font-size: 60px;
  line-height: 72px;
  font-weight: 700;
  letter-spacing: -0.02em;
}


.text-h1 {
  font-size: 32px;
  line-height: 40px;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: #111827;
}


.text-h2 {
  font-size: 24px;
  line-height: 32px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #111827;
}


.text-body {
  font-size: 14px;
  line-height: 20px;
  font-weight: 400;
  color: #374151;
}


.text-small {
  font-size: 13px;
  line-height: 18px;
  font-weight: 400;
  color: #6B7280;
}


.text-label {
  font-size: 14px;
  line-height: 20px;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: #374151;
}


.text-mono {
  font-family: "Fira Code", monospace;
  font-size: 13px;
  line-height: 18px;
}


TEXT DECORATIONS:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


Links:
- Color: #3B82F6 (Blue 500)
- Text decoration: None (default)
- Hover: Underline
- Visited: Same color (consistency)
- Active: Darker blue


Emphasis:
- <strong>: Font weight 600
- <em>: Italic (sparingly)
- <mark>: Yellow background highlight


Strikethrough:
- Use for: Discounted prices, obsolete info
- Style: line-through, #9CA3AF color


Underline:
- Avoid except for links
- Use bold or color for emphasis instead


RESPONSIVE TYPOGRAPHY:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


Mobile (< 768px):
- H1: 24px (‚Üì from 32px)
- H2: 20px (‚Üì from 24px)
- H3: 18px (same)
- Body: 14px (same)
- Increase line height slightly for readability


Tablet (768px - 1023px):
- H1: 28px
- H2: 22px
- H3: 18px
- Body: 14px


Desktop (1024px+):
- H1: 32px
- H2: 24px
- H3: 20px
- Body: 14px


SPECIAL TEXT TYPES:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


Numbers (Tabular):
- Font feature: font-variant-numeric: tabular-nums
- Purpose: Align numbers vertically in tables
- Weight: 600 (stands out)


.text-numeric {
  font-variant-numeric: tabular-nums;
  font-weight: 600;
}


All Caps:
- Text transform: uppercase
- Font size: Slightly smaller (90%)
- Letter spacing: 0.05em
- Use sparingly (labels, badges)


.text-caps {
  text-transform: uppercase;
  font-size: 0.9em;
  letter-spacing: 0.05em;
  font-weight: 600;
}


Currency:
- Format: $1,234.56
- Font weight: 600
- Tabular numbers


SKU/Code:
- Monospace font
- Background: Light gray
- Padding: 2px 6px
- Border radius: 3px


.text-code {
  font-family: "Fira Code", monospace;
  background: #F3F4F6;
  padding: 2px 6px;
  border-radius: 3px;
  font-size: 13px;
}


TEXT ALIGNMENT:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
- Left: Default for body text
- Right: Numbers, prices in tables
- Center: Headings, empty states, modals
- Justify: Avoid (creates uneven spacing)


TRUNCATION:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


Single Line:
.truncate {
  overflow: hidden;
  text-overflow: ellipsis;
  white-space: nowrap;
}


Multi-line (2 lines):
.line-clamp-2 {
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-line-clamp: 2;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  overflow: hidden;
}


ACCESSIBILITY:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
- Minimum font size: 12px (prefer 14px)
- Contrast ratio: 4.5:1 for normal text, 3:1 for large text
- Avoid light text on light backgrounds
- Use semantic HTML (h1, h2, p)
- Don't rely on color alone
- Provide text alternatives for icons


FONT LOADING:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


Strategy: font-display: swap
- Show system font immediately
- Swap to custom font when loaded
- Prevents invisible text (FOIT)


Preload critical fonts:
<link rel="preload" href="/fonts/Inter-Regular.woff2" as="font" 
      type="font/woff2" crossorigin>


BEST PRACTICES:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
‚úì Use system font stack as fallback
‚úì Limit to 2-3 font families max
‚úì Use font weights consistently
‚úì Maintain clear hierarchy
‚úì Test at different zoom levels
‚úì Consider dyslexic-friendly fonts
‚úì Optimize font loading


‚úó Don't use too many weights
‚úó Don't mix different font families randomly
‚úó Don't use font sizes below 12px
‚úó Don't use italics for long text
‚úó Don't use decorative fonts for UI


8. SPACING & LAYOUT SYSTEM


‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê
‚îÇ                      SPACING & LAYOUT SYSTEM                             ‚îÇ
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò


SPACING SCALE (8px Base Unit):
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


0:    0px
1:    4px   (0.25rem)  - Tight spacing
2:    8px   (0.5rem)   - Base unit
3:    12px  (0.75rem)  - Small spacing
4:    16px  (1rem)     - Default spacing
5:    20px  (1.25rem)  - Medium spacing
6:    24px  (1.5rem)   - Large spacing
8:    32px  (2rem)     - XLarge spacing
10:   40px  (2.5rem)   - XXLarge spacing
12:   48px  (3rem)     - Huge spacing
16:   64px  (4rem)     - Extra huge
20:   80px  (5rem)     - Maximum spacing
24:   96px  (6rem)     - Very rare


Common Usage:
- 4px:  Icon padding, tight elements
- 8px:  Small gaps, compact lists
- 12px: Button padding (vertical)
- 16px: Card padding, default spacing
- 24px: Section spacing, card margins
- 32px: Page padding, large sections
- 48px: Major section breaks


MARGIN SYSTEM:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


Component Margins:
- Between cards: 16px (mobile), 24px (desktop)
- Between sections: 32px (mobile), 48px (desktop)
- Page margins: 16px (mobile), 24px (desktop)
- Between buttons: 8px (horizontal), 12px (vertical)


Vertical Rhythm:
- Paragraph spacing: 16px
- Section spacing: 48px
- Page top padding: 24px


PADDING SYSTEM:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


Container Padding:
- Page container: 16px (mobile), 24px (desktop)
- Card padding: 16px (mobile), 24px (desktop)
- Modal padding: 20px (mobile), 24px (desktop)


Component Padding:
- Buttons: 12px 24px (medium)
- Input fields: 10px 14px
- Table cells: 12px 16px
- List items: 12px 16px
- Badges: 4px 12px


GRID SYSTEM:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


12-Column Grid:
- Gutter: 24px (desktop), 16px (mobile)
- Max width: 1536px
- Columns: 12
- Responsive: Fluid


Column Spans:
- Full width: col-span-12
- Half: col-span-6
- Third: col-span-4
- Quarter: col-span-3
- Two-thirds: col-span-8


Example Grid:
‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê
‚îÇ ‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¨‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¨‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ ‚îÇ col-4 (33.33%)     ‚îÇ col-4 (33.33%)     ‚îÇ col-4 (33.33%)     ‚îÇ       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¥‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¥‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ ‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¨‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ ‚îÇ col-8 (66.67%)                 ‚îÇ col-4 (33.33%)               ‚îÇ      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¥‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò      ‚îÇ
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò


CONTAINER SYSTEM:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


Container Max Widths:
- sm: 640px   (mobile landscape)
- md: 768px   (tablet)
- lg: 1024px  (laptop)
- xl: 1280px  (desktop)
- 2xl: 1536px (large desktop)


Container Types:
1. Full Width:
   - Width: 100%
   - No max-width
   - Use: Backgrounds, full sections


2. Contained:
   - Max width: 1536px
   - Centered: margin: 0 auto
   - Padding: 24px (sides)
   - Use: Main content


3. Narrow:
   - Max width: 800px
   - Centered
   - Use: Forms, reading content


LAYOUT PATTERNS:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


1. SIDEBAR LAYOUT:
‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê

Gap: 0 (no gap, adjacent)
Sidebar: Fixed width or flexible (20-25%)
Main: flex-grow: 1


2. TWO-COLUMN LAYOUT:
‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê

‚îÇ ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¥‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò  ‚îÇ

3. DASHBOARD GRID:
‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê

‚îÇ ‚îÇ Table                  ‚îÇ Stats Widget     ‚îÇ                           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¥‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò                           ‚îÇ

4. CARD GRID:
‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê
‚îÇ ‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¨‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¨‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¨‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ ‚îÇ  Card    ‚îÇ  Card    ‚îÇ  Card    ‚îÇ  Card    ‚îÇ                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¥‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¥‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¥‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ ‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¨‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¨‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¨‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ ‚îÇ  Card    ‚îÇ  Card    ‚îÇ  Card    ‚îÇ  Card    ‚îÇ                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¥‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¥‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¥‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò                          ‚îÇ
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò


Gap: 24px
Columns: 4 (desktop), 2 (tablet), 1 (mobile)
Equal height: align-items: stretch


Z-INDEX SCALE:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
- Base: 0 (Default layer)
- Dropdown: 10
- Sticky: 20
- Fixed: 30
- Modal backdrop: 40
- Modal: 50
- Popover: 60
- Tooltip: 70
- Toast: 80


Never use arbitrary values like 9999!


ASPECT RATIOS:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
- Square: 1:1
- Landscape: 16:9
- Portrait: 4:3
- Wide: 21:9
- Product card image: 4:3
- Hero image: 16:9


BORDER RADIUS:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
- none: 0px
- sm: 4px   (Badges, tags)
- base: 6px  (Buttons, inputs) - Default
- md: 8px   (Cards)
- lg: 12px  (Large cards)
- xl: 16px  (Modals)
- full: 9999px (Pills, avatars)


RESPONSIVE SPACING:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


Mobile (< 768px):
- Container padding: 16px
- Card padding: 16px
- Section spacing: 24px
- Component gap: 12px


Tablet (768px - 1023px):
- Container padding: 20px
- Card padding: 20px
- Section spacing: 32px
- Component gap: 16px


Desktop (1024px+):
- Container padding: 24px
- Card padding: 24px
- Section spacing: 48px
- Component gap: 24px


WHITESPACE PRINCIPLES:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
‚úì Use consistent spacing
‚úì Group related elements closer
‚úì Separate unrelated elements more
‚úì Use whitespace to create hierarchy
‚úì Don't fear empty space
‚úì Align elements to grid


‚úó Don't use random spacing values
‚úó Don't cram too much content
‚úó Don't ignore visual hierarchy
‚úó Don't make everything equal distance


9. ANIMATION & TRANSITIONS


‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê
‚îÇ                    ANIMATION & TRANSITIONS                               ‚îÇ
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò


TIMING FUNCTIONS:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


ease-out: Start fast, end slow
- Use: Elements entering
- Curve: cubic-bezier(0, 0, 0.2, 1)
- Example: Modal opening, dropdown appearing


ease-in: Start slow, end fast
- Use: Elements exiting
- Curve: cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 1, 1)
- Example: Modal closing, toast disappearing


ease-in-out: Slow start and end
- Use: Moving elements
- Curve: cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1)
- Example: Slide animations, position changes


linear: Constant speed
- Use: Loading spinners, continuous animations
- Curve: linear
- Example: Progress bar, spinner rotation


DURATION SCALE:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
- Instant: 0ms (No animation)
- Fast: 150ms (Quick feedback)
- Base: 200ms (Default transitions)
- Medium: 300ms (Modals, dropdowns)
- Slow: 500ms (Large elements, page transitions)
- Slower: 700ms (Complex animations)


Common Durations:
- Hover effects: 150ms
- Button press: 100ms
- Dropdown open: 200ms
- Modal open: 300ms
- Toast appear: 200ms
- Page transition: 300ms


TRANSITION PROPERTIES:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


Standard Transition:
.transition {
  transition-property: all;
  transition-duration: 200ms;
  transition-timing-function: ease-out;
}


Specific Properties:
.transition-colors {
  transition-property: background-color, border-color, color;
  transition-duration: 150ms;
}


.transition-transform {
  transition-property: transform;
  transition-duration: 200ms;
}


.transition-opacity {
  transition-property: opacity;
  transition-duration: 200ms;
}


COMMON ANIMATIONS:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


1. FADE IN:
@keyframes fadeIn {
  from { opacity: 0; }
  to { opacity: 1; }
}


.fade-in {
  animation: fadeIn 200ms ease-out;
}


Use: Toasts, alerts, content appearing


2. FADE OUT:
@keyframes fadeOut {
  from { opacity: 1; }
  to { opacity: 0; }
}


.fade-out {
  animation: fadeOut 200ms ease-in;
}


Use: Dismissing elements


3. SLIDE IN (From Right):
@keyframes slideInRight {
  from {
    transform: translateX(100%);
    opacity: 0;
  }
  to {
    transform: translateX(0);
    opacity: 1;
  }
}


.slide-in-right {
  animation: slideInRight 300ms ease-out;
}


Use: Side panels, notifications


4. SLIDE DOWN:
@keyframes slideDown {
  from {
    transform: translateY(-10px);
    opacity: 0;
  }
  to {
    transform: translateY(0);
    opacity: 1;
  }
}


.slide-down {
  animation: slideDown 200ms ease-out;
}


Use: Dropdowns, menus


5. SCALE IN:
@keyframes scaleIn {
  from {
    transform: scale(0.95);
    opacity: 0;
  }
  to {
    transform: scale(1);
    opacity: 1;
  }
}


.scale-in {
  animation: scaleIn 200ms ease-out;
}


Use: Modals, popovers


6. BOUNCE:
@keyframes bounce {
  0%, 100% { transform: translateY(0); }
  50% { transform: translateY(-10px); }
}


.bounce {
  animation: bounce 500ms ease-in-out;
}


Use: Drawing attention, success feedback


7. SHAKE:
@keyframes shake {
  0%, 100% { transform: translateX(0); }
  25% { transform: translateX(-5px); }
  75% { transform: translateX(5px); }
}


.shake {
  animation: shake 400ms ease-in-out;
}


Use: Error feedback, validation failures


8. PULSE:
@keyframes pulse {
  0%, 100% { opacity: 1; }
  50% { opacity: 0.6; }
}


.pulse {
  animation: pulse 2s ease-in-out infinite;
}


Use: Loading indicators, live status


9. SPIN:
@keyframes spin {
  from { transform: rotate(0deg); }
  to { transform: rotate(360deg); }
}


.spin {
  animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}


Use: Loading spinners


10. SHIMMER (Skeleton):
@keyframes shimmer {
  0% { background-position: -1000px 0; }
  100% { background-position: 1000px 0; }
}


.shimmer {
  background: linear-gradient(
    90deg,
    #E5E7EB 0px,
    #F3F4F6 50%,
    #E5E7EB 100%
  );
  background-size: 1000px 100%;
  animation: shimmer 1.5s ease-in-out infinite;
}


Use: Skeleton screens, loading placeholders


HOVER EFFECTS:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


Button Hover:
.button {
  transition: all 150ms ease-out;
}


.button:hover {
  background-color: darker-shade;
  transform: translateY(-1px);
  box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
}


.button:active {
  transform: translateY(0);
}


Card Hover:
.card {
  transition: all 200ms ease-out;
}


.card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-4px);
  box-shadow: 0 10px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
}


Link Hover:
.link {
  transition: color 150ms ease-out;
}


.link:hover {
  color: #2563EB; /* Darker blue */
  text-decoration: underline;
}


LOADING STATES:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


Spinner:
.spinner {
  animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}


Progress Bar:
.progress-bar {
  transition: width 300ms ease-out;
}


Skeleton:
.skeleton {
  animation: shimmer 1.5s ease-in-out infinite;
}


MICROINTERACTIONS:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


Checkbox Check:
- Duration: 200ms
- Animation: Scale in + fade in
- Easing: ease-out


Toggle Switch:
- Duration: 150ms
- Animation: Slide circle + color change
- Easing: ease-in-out


Input Focus:
- Duration: 150ms
- Animation: Border color + box shadow
- Easing: ease-out


Dropdown Open:
- Duration: 200ms
- Animation: Slide down + fade in
- Easing: ease-out


Toast Appear:
- Enter: Slide in + fade (300ms)
- Exit: Slide out + fade (200ms)
- Stack adjustment: 200ms


PAGE TRANSITIONS:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


Route Change:
- Fade out current: 150ms
- Fade in new: 200ms
- Total: 350ms


Modal:
- Backdrop fade: 200ms
- Modal slide + scale: 300ms
- Total: 300ms (parallel)


PERFORMANCE GUIDELINES:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


‚úì Prefer transform and opacity (GPU accelerated)
‚úì Use will-change for complex animations
‚úì Avoid animating: width, height, top, left
‚úì Keep animations under 300ms
‚úì Use requestAnimationFrame for JS animations
‚úì Reduce motion for accessibility


‚úó Don't animate everything
‚úó Don't use long durations (>500ms)
‚úó Don't animate layout properties
‚úó Don't ignore prefers-reduced-motion
‚úó Don't chain too many animations


ACCESSIBILITY:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


Respect User Preferences:
@media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) {
  * {
    animation-duration: 0.01ms !important;
    animation-iteration-count: 1 !important;
    transition-duration: 0.01ms !important;
  }
}


ANIMATION BEST PRACTICES:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
‚úì Purposeful: Every animation should have a reason
‚úì Consistent: Use same timings throughout
‚úì Subtle: Don't distract from content
‚úì Fast: Keep under 300ms for UI feedback
‚úì Smooth: Use appropriate easing
‚úì Accessible: Respect reduced motion preference


10. FINAL IMPLEMENTATION CHECKLIST


‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê
‚îÇ                   IMPLEMENTATION CHECKLIST                               ‚îÇ
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò


DESIGN SYSTEM SETUP:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
‚òê Define color palette (primary, semantic, neutral)
‚òê Set up typography system (fonts, sizes, weights)
‚òê Create spacing scale (4px/8px base)
‚òê Define breakpoints (mobile, tablet, desktop)
‚òê Set up grid system (12-column)
‚òê Create z-index scale
‚òê Define animation timings


COMPONENT LIBRARY:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
‚òê Buttons (primary, secondary, outline, text, icon)
‚òê Form inputs (text, textarea, select, checkbox, radio)
‚òê Cards (basic, with header, with footer)
‚òê Badges & Pills (status, count, category)
‚òê Tables (sortable, filterable, paginated)
‚òê Modals & Dialogs (confirmation, form, info)
‚òê Tooltips & Popovers
‚òê Alerts (success, error, warning, info)
‚òê Toasts (notifications)
‚òê Loading states (spinners, skeletons, progress)
‚òê Charts (line, bar, pie, donut, area)
‚òê Navigation (sidebar, header, breadcrumbs)
‚òê Pagination
‚òê Search bars
‚òê Dropdowns & Menus
‚òê Tabs
‚òê Accordions
‚òê Date pickers
‚òê File uploads


PAGE TEMPLATES:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
‚òê Login page
‚òê Dashboard
‚òê Product list
‚òê Add/Edit product
‚òê Order list
‚òê Order details
‚òê Customer list
‚òê Customer details
‚òê Vendor list
‚òê Vendor approval
‚òê Categories management
‚òê Reviews list
‚òê Coupons management
‚òê Reports & Analytics
‚òê Settings pages
‚òê Notifications center


RESPONSIVE DESIGN:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
‚òê Mobile layout (< 768px)
‚òê Tablet layout (768px - 1023px)
‚òê Desktop layout (1024px+)
‚òê Touch-optimized interactions
‚òê Hamburger menu (mobile)
‚òê Collapsible sidebar (tablet)
‚òê Table ‚Üí Card view (mobile)
‚òê Full-screen modals (mobile)
‚òê Bottom sheet (mobile alternative)


ACCESSIBILITY:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
‚òê Semantic HTML (h1-h6, nav, main, etc.)
‚òê ARIA labels where needed
‚òê Keyboard navigation
‚òê Focus indicators
‚òê Skip to main content
‚òê Alt text for images
‚òê Color contrast (WCAG AA)
‚òê Screen reader testing
‚òê Reduced motion support
‚òê Form label associations


INTERACTIONS:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
‚òê Hover states
‚òê Active/pressed states
‚òê Focus states
‚òê Disabled states
‚òê Loading states
‚òê Empty states
‚òê Error states
‚òê Success feedback
‚òê Transition animations
‚òê Microinteractions


FUNCTIONALITY:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
‚òê Search functionality
‚òê Filtering (by status, category, date)
‚òê Sorting (ascending, descending)
‚òê Pagination
‚òê Bulk actions
‚òê Export data (CSV, PDF)
‚òê Form validation
‚òê Inline editing
‚òê Drag & drop
‚òê Image upload & preview


DATA VISUALIZATION:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
‚òê Revenue chart
‚òê Sales trends
‚òê Order status distribution
‚òê Customer segments
‚òê Product performance
‚òê Vendor comparison
‚òê Traffic sources
‚òê Conversion funnel
‚òê Heatmaps (optional)
‚òê Real-time updates (optional)


PERFORMANCE:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
‚òê Image optimization (WebP, lazy loading)
‚òê Code splitting
‚òê CSS minification
‚òê JS minification
‚òê Gzip compression
‚òê CDN for assets
‚òê Caching strategy
‚òê Reduce bundle size
‚òê Optimize fonts
‚òê Lighthouse score > 90


TESTING:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
‚òê Cross-browser (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge)
‚òê Cross-device (iPhone, iPad, Android)
‚òê Portrait & landscape
‚òê Different screen sizes
‚òê Slow network (throttling)
‚òê Screen readers
‚òê Keyboard navigation
‚òê Print styles (optional)

FINAL SUMMARY


‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê

E-COMMERCE PLATFORM - VENDOR DASHBOARD

COMPLETE PAGE STRUCTURE & FUNCTIONALITY

‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ                                                                                                                                 VENDOR DASHBOARD - ALL PAGES                          
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


VENDOR DASHBOARD OVERVIEW:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
Vendors ‡¶π‡¶≤ marketplace ‡¶è‡¶∞ sellers ‡¶Ø‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶æ ‡¶§‡¶æ‡¶¶‡ßá‡¶∞ products ‡¶¨‡¶ø‡¶ï‡ßç‡¶∞‡¶ø ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá‡•§
‡¶™‡ßç‡¶∞‡¶§‡¶ø‡¶ü‡¶ø vendor ‡¶è‡¶∞ ‡¶è‡¶ï‡¶ü‡¶ø dedicated dashboard ‡¶•‡¶æ‡¶ï‡¶¨‡ßá ‡¶Ø‡ßá‡¶ñ‡¶æ‡¶®‡ßá ‡¶§‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶æ:
- ‡¶§‡¶æ‡¶¶‡ßá‡¶∞ products manage ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá
- Orders track ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá
- Sales analytics ‡¶¶‡ßá‡¶ñ‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá
- Payments/Commissions track ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá
- Customer reviews handle ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá


ACCESS LEVEL:
- Role: Vendor
- Permissions: Limited to own data only
- Cannot see: Other vendors' data, admin functions, system settings
- Can see: Own products, own orders, own analytics, own payments


VENDOR DASHBOARD PAGES (COMPLETE LIST)


‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
                         PAGE LIST (12 PAGES)                             
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ

   - Product List
   - Add New Product
   - Edit Product

   - All Orders
   - Order Details

   - Payout Requests

PAGE 1: DASHBOARD (VENDOR OVERVIEW)


‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
‚îÇ                         VENDOR DASHBOARD                                 ‚îÇ
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


PURPOSE:
Vendor ‡¶è‡¶∞ business ‡¶è‡¶∞ overall snapshot ‡¶¶‡ßá‡¶ñ‡¶æ‡¶®‡ßã


WHAT VENDOR CAN SEE:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


1. KEY METRICS CARDS (Top Row):
     

   - Total Sales: This month ‡¶è‡¶∞ total revenue
   - Total Orders: This month ‡¶è‡¶∞ order count
   - Products: Total products (Active/Inactive breakdown)
   - Pending: Pending orders ‡¶Ø‡ßá‡¶ó‡ßÅ‡¶≤‡ßã process ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶π‡¶¨‡ßá


2. RECENT ORDERS (Table):
   - Last 10 orders
   - Columns: Order#, Customer, Date, Items, Total, Status, Actions
   - Quick Actions: View Details, Mark Shipped, Print Invoice
   - Filter: By status (Pending, Processing, Shipped)
   - Link to: Full Orders page


3. LOW STOCK ALERTS:
   - Products ‡¶Ø‡ßá‡¶ó‡ßÅ‡¶≤‡ßã‡¶∞ stock ‡¶ï‡¶Æ (< threshold)
   - Product Name, Current Stock, SKU
   - Quick Action: Update Stock button
   - Alert Badge: Red notification


4. SALES CHART:
   - Last 30 days sales trend
   - Line/Bar chart
   - Daily/Weekly toggle
   - Hover: Show exact amount per day
   - Compare: Previous period comparison


5. TOP SELLING PRODUCTS:
   - Top 5 products by revenue
   - Product Name, Units Sold, Revenue
   - Thumbnail image
   - Click: Go to product details


6. PENDING REVIEWS:
   - Customer reviews pending vendor response
   - Count badge
   - Quick link to Reviews page


7. COMMISSION BREAKDOWN:
   - Earned: $12,450
   - Platform Commission (15%): -$1,867.50
   - Net Earnings: $10,582.50
   - Pending Payout: $5,200
   - Next Payout Date: March 1, 2026


8. QUICK ACTIONS (Buttons):
   - Add New Product
   - View Orders
   - Request Payout
   - Contact Support


WHAT VENDOR CAN DO:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
‚úì ‡¶¶‡ßá‡¶ñ‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Overall business performance
‚úì Click ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Any card/chart to see details
‚úì Navigate ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Any linked page
‚úì Quick actions ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Add product, view orders
‚úó Cannot: See other vendors' data, admin functions


PAGE 2: MY PRODUCTS


‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
‚îÇ                          MY PRODUCTS                                     
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


PURPOSE:
Vendor ‡¶§‡¶æ‡¶∞ ‡¶∏‡¶¨ products manage ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá


WHAT VENDOR CAN SEE:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


1. PAGE HEADER:
   - Total Products: 45
   - Active: 42 | Inactive: 3 | Out of Stock: 5
   - Button: [+ Add New Product]
   - Button: [Bulk Import CSV]


2. FILTERS & SEARCH:
   - Search: By product name, SKU
   - Filter by Status: All, Active, Inactive, Out of Stock, Pending Approval
   - Filter by Category: Dropdown list
   - Sort by: Name, Price, Stock, Date Added, Sales


3. PRODUCTS TABLE:
   Columns:
   
  
   Status Badges:
   - Active: Green
   - Inactive: Gray
   - Pending Approval: Yellow (admin approval needed)
   - Out of Stock: Red


4. PRODUCT ACTIONS (‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢ Menu):
   - Edit Product
   - View Product (frontend preview)
   - Duplicate Product
   - Activate/Deactivate
   - Delete Product
   - View Analytics (sales, views)


5. BULK ACTIONS:
   (When products selected via checkbox)
   - Activate Selected
   - Deactivate Selected
   - Delete Selected
   - Export Selected (CSV)
   - Change Category
   - Apply Discount


6. PAGINATION:
   - Items per page: 20, 50, 100
   - Total pages indicator
   - Jump to page option


WHAT VENDOR CAN DO:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
‚úì Add ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: New products (‡¶Ø‡¶æ‡¶Ø‡¶º admin approval ‡¶è)
‚úì Edit ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Own products (name, price, description, images, stock)
‚úì Delete ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Own products
‚úì Activate/Deactivate ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Products
‚úì Duplicate ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Products (quick copy)
‚úì Search/Filter ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Products
‚úì Bulk actions ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Multiple products at once
‚úì Export ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Product list (CSV)
‚úì Import ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Products via CSV
‚úó Cannot: See/edit other vendors' products, bypass admin approval


PAGE 3: ADD/EDIT PRODUCT


‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
‚îÇ                      ADD/EDIT PRODUCT PAGE                               
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


PURPOSE:
New product add ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶æ ‡¶¨‡¶æ existing product edit ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶æ


FORM SECTIONS:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


1. BASIC INFORMATION:
   Fields:
   - Product Name * (Required)
   - Short Description (160 chars, for listings)
   - Full Description * (Rich text editor)
   - Category * (Dropdown - pre-defined by admin)
   - Sub-category (If applicable)
   - Brand (Optional)
   - Tags (Multi-select, for search)


2. PRODUCT IMAGES:
   - Primary Image * (Required, main display)
   - Additional Images (Up to 10)
   - Drag & Drop upload
   - Image preview
   - Reorder images (drag to reorder)
   - Delete image option
   - Requirements: Max 5MB, JPG/PNG/WebP


3. PRICING:
   - Regular Price * (Required)
   - Sale Price (Optional)
   - Sale Start Date (If sale price set)
   - Sale End Date (If sale price set)
   - Cost Price (For vendor's reference, not shown to customers)
   - Tax Class (Standard, Reduced, Zero-rated)
   - Currency: Auto (based on store settings)


4. INVENTORY:
   - SKU * (Auto-generate option or manual entry)
   - Stock Quantity *
   - Low Stock Threshold (Alert when stock below this)
   - Stock Status: In Stock, Out of Stock, On Backorder
   - ‚òë Track Inventory (Enable/Disable)
   - ‚òë Allow Backorders
   - Barcode/ISBN (Optional)


5. SHIPPING:
   - Weight (kg)
   - Dimensions: Length √ó Width √ó Height (cm)
   - Shipping Class (Standard, Express, Free)
   - ‚òë Requires Shipping (Uncheck for digital products)
   - Estimated Delivery Time (Days)


6. PRODUCT VARIANTS (Optional):
   (For products with size/color variations)
   - Variant Type: Size, Color, Material, etc.
   - Add Variant: Button
   
   Example Variants Table:
   ‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê
   ‚îÇVariant   ‚îÇPrice  ‚îÇSKU    ‚îÇStock  ‚îÇActions ‚îÇ
   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î§
   ‚îÇM-Blue  ‚îÇ$99    ‚îÇLP-MB  ‚îÇ 10    ‚îÇ[Edit]  ‚îÇ
   ‚îÇL-Blue   ‚îÇ$99    ‚îÇLP-LB   ‚îÇ 15    ‚îÇ[Edit]  ‚îÇ
   ‚îÇM-Red   ‚îÇ$109  ‚îÇLP-MR  ‚îÇ 5     ‚îÇ[Edit]  ‚îÇ
   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò


7. SEO (Optional but Recommended):
   - Meta Title (60 chars)
   - Meta Description (160 chars)
   - URL Slug (Auto-generated, editable)
   - Focus Keyword


8. PRODUCT ATTRIBUTES (Specifications):
   Add custom attributes:
   - Attribute Name: Value pairs
   Example:
     - Material: Aluminum
     - Processor: Intel i7
     - RAM: 16GB
     - Screen Size: 15.6"


9. VISIBILITY & STATUS:
   - Product Status: 
     ‚óã Active (Live on store)
     ‚óã Inactive (Not visible)
     ‚óã Draft (Save for later)
   - Featured Product: ‚òë Checkbox
   - ‚òë Allow Reviews


10. RELATED PRODUCTS (Optional):
    - Search and select related products
    - Show as "You may also like"


FORM ACTIONS:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
Bottom Fixed Bar:
- [Cancel] - Go back without saving
- [Save as Draft] - Save but don't publish
- [Submit for Approval] - Send to admin for review
- [Update Product] - Update existing product


VALIDATION RULES:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
* Required fields must be filled
* Price must be > 0
* Images: At least 1 required
* SKU must be unique
* Stock quantity must be ‚â• 0
* If sale price set, must be < regular price


APPROVAL WORKFLOW:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
New Product ‚Üí Submit ‚Üí Admin Review ‚Üí Approved/Rejected
- Pending Approval: Vendor ‡¶¶‡ßá‡¶ñ‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá ‡¶ï‡¶ø‡¶®‡ßç‡¶§‡ßÅ customers ‡¶¶‡ßá‡¶ñ‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá ‡¶®‡¶æ
- Approved: Live ‡¶π‡¶Ø‡¶º‡ßá ‡¶Ø‡¶æ‡¶¨‡ßá
- Rejected: Admin reason ‡¶¶‡ßá‡¶¨‡ßá, vendor edit ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡ßá resubmit ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá


WHAT VENDOR CAN DO:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
‚úì Fill ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: All form fields
‚úì Upload ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Product images (max 10)
‚úì Set ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Pricing, inventory, shipping details
‚úì Create ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Product variants
‚úì Add ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Product attributes/specifications
‚úì Save ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: As draft or submit for approval
‚úì Preview ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: How product will look on store
‚úó Cannot: Publish directly without admin approval (new products only)
‚úó Cannot: Change category structure, add new categories


PAGE 4: ORDERS


‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
‚îÇ                            ORDERS PAGE                                   
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


PURPOSE:
Vendor ‡¶§‡¶æ‡¶∞ products ‡¶è‡¶∞ ‡¶∏‡¶¨ orders manage ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá
‡¶∂‡ßÅ‡¶ß‡ßÅ‡¶Æ‡¶æ‡¶§‡ßç‡¶∞ ‡¶Ø‡ßá‡¶á orders ‡¶è vendor ‡¶è‡¶∞ product ‡¶Ü‡¶õ‡ßá ‡¶∏‡ßá‡¶ó‡ßÅ‡¶≤‡ßã‡¶á ‡¶¶‡ßá‡¶ñ‡¶æ‡¶¨‡ßá


WHAT VENDOR CAN SEE:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


1. PAGE HEADER:
   - Total Orders: 234
   - Pending: 12 | Processing: 45 | Shipped: 150 | Delivered: 20
   - Button: [Export Orders]


2. STATUS TABS:
   [All (234)] [Pending (12)] [Processing (45)] [Shipped (150)] 
   [Delivered (20)] [Cancelled (7)]


3. FILTERS & SEARCH:
   - Search: Order number, customer name
   - Date Range: Last 7 days, Last 30 days, Custom
   - Filter by Payment: Paid, Pending, Failed
   - Sort by: Date, Amount, Status


4. ORDERS TABLE:
     
   Order Status Colors:
   - üü° Pending: Needs processing
   - üîµ Processing: Being prepared
   - üü£ Shipped: On the way
   - üü¢ Delivered: Completed
   - üî¥ Cancelled: Cancelled


5. ORDER ACTIONS (‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢ Menu):
   - View Details
   - Mark as Shipped (if Processing)
   - Print Invoice
   - Print Packing Slip
   - Contact Customer
   - Cancel Order (with reason)


6. BULK ACTIONS:
   (When orders selected)
   - Mark as Shipped
   - Print Invoices
   - Export Selected
   - Send Tracking Updates


ORDER DETAIL VIEW:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
(Opens when clicking order number or "View Details")


Contains:


1. ORDER INFORMATION:
   - Order Number: #10234
   - Order Date: Feb 16, 2026, 10:30 AM
   - Order Status: Processing
   - Payment Status: Paid
   - Payment Method: Stripe


2. CUSTOMER INFORMATION:
   - Name: John Doe
   - Email: john@example.com
   - Phone: +1 234 567 8900
   - Customer Since: Jan 2025
   - Total Orders from this customer: 5


3. SHIPPING ADDRESS:
   - Full address
   - Special delivery instructions (if any)


4. BILLING ADDRESS:
   - Same as shipping or different


5. ORDER ITEMS:
   (‡¶∂‡ßÅ‡¶ß‡ßÅ‡¶Æ‡¶æ‡¶§‡ßç‡¶∞ ‡¶è‡¶á vendor ‡¶è‡¶∞ products)
     

6. PRICE BREAKDOWN:
   - Subtotal: $1,028
   - Shipping: $15
   - Tax (10%): $102.80
   - Discount (Coupon SAVE10): -$100
   - ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
   - Total: $1,045.80
   
   Vendor's Earnings:
   - Total: $1,028
   - Platform Commission (15%): -$154.20
   - Net Earnings: $873.80


7. SHIPPING INFORMATION:
   - Carrier: (Vendor selects)
   - Tracking Number: (Vendor enters)
   - Estimated Delivery: (Auto calculated or manual)
   - Shipping Method: Express (2-3 days)


8. ORDER TIMELINE:
   ‚úÖ Feb 16, 10:30 AM - Order Placed
   ‚úÖ Feb 16, 10:35 AM - Payment Confirmed
   üîµ Feb 16, 11:00 AM - Processing (Current)
   ‚ö™ Pending - Shipped
   ‚ö™ Pending - Delivered


9. INTERNAL NOTES:
   (Only vendor can see)
   - Vendor can add private notes
   - Example: "Customer requested gift wrap"


10. CUSTOMER MESSAGES:
    - Messages from customer about this order
    - Vendor can reply


ACTIONS ON ORDER DETAIL PAGE:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
Button Group:
- [Print Invoice]
- [Print Packing Slip]
- [Mark as Shipped] (Opens modal)
- [Cancel Order] (Opens confirmation)
- [Contact Customer] (Opens email modal)


MARK AS SHIPPED MODAL:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
Fields:
- Shipping Carrier: [Dropdown: FedEx, UPS, USPS, DHL, Other]
- Tracking Number: [Input]
- Shipping Date: [Date picker, default: Today]
- Estimated Delivery: [Date picker]
- Notes (Optional): [Textarea]


Actions:
- [Cancel]
- [Save & Notify Customer] - Sends email with tracking info


WHAT VENDOR CAN DO:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
‚úì ‡¶¶‡ßá‡¶ñ‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Orders ‡¶Ø‡ßá‡¶ñ‡¶æ‡¶®‡ßá ‡¶§‡¶æ‡¶∞ products ‡¶Ü‡¶õ‡ßá
‚úì Filter ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: By status, date, payment
‚úì Search ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Order number, customer name
‚úì View ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Full order details
‚úì Mark ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Orders as Shipped (with tracking)
‚úì Print ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Invoices, packing slips
‚úì Add ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Internal notes
‚úì Message ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Customers
‚úì Cancel ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Orders (before shipping, with reason)
‚úì Export ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Order data (CSV)
‚úó Cannot: See orders without his products
‚úó Cannot: Change order total or items
‚úó Cannot: Process refunds (customer contacts admin)
‚úó Cannot: Cancel after shipping


PAGE 5: INVENTORY MANAGEMENT


Stock Status Indicators:
   - üü¢ Green: Stock > Threshold (Healthy)
   - üü° Amber: Stock = Threshold (Warning)
   - üî¥ Red: Stock < Threshold (Low/Out)


3. FILTERS:
   - All Products
   - In Stock (Above threshold)
   - Low Stock (At or below threshold)
   - Out of Stock (Zero quantity)
   - Sort by: Stock Level, Value, Product Name


4. INVENTORY ACTIONS (‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢ Menu):
   - Quick Update Stock
   - View Stock History
   - Set Low Stock Alert
   - Reorder Product (Coming soon)


QUICK STOCK UPDATE:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
(Modal opens)
- Current Stock: 3
- Adjustment Type: 
  ‚óã Add Stock (Purchase/Restock)
  ‚óã Reduce Stock (Damage/Return)
  ‚óã Set Exact Amount
- Quantity: [Input]
- Reason: [Dropdown: Purchase, Return, Damage, Correction, Other]
- Notes: [Textarea - Optional]
- [Cancel] [Update Stock]


STOCK HISTORY:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
(Shows for each product)
  

Email notifications:
- Vendor receives email when any product hits low stock
- Daily digest of low stock products
- Can configure: Settings > Notifications


BULK STOCK UPDATE:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
- Select multiple products (checkbox)
- Button: [Bulk Update Stock]
- Modal opens:
  - Action: Add/Reduce/Set
  - Amount: Same for all or individual
  - Reason: Dropdown
  - [Update All]


STOCK VALUATION:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ

- Total Inventory Value: $45,230
- By Category breakdown:
  - Electronics: $38,500
  - Accessories: $6,730


EXPORT OPTIONS:

- Export Inventory Report (CSV/Excel)
- Contains: Product, SKU, Stock, Value, Status


WHAT VENDOR CAN DO:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
‚úì ‡¶¶‡ßá‡¶ñ‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Current stock levels of all products
‚úì Update ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Stock quantities (increase/decrease)
‚úì Set ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Low stock thresholds per product
‚úì View ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Stock movement history
‚úì Filter ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: By stock status
‚úì Bulk update ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Multiple products at once
‚úì Export ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Inventory reports
‚úì Receive ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Low stock email alerts
‚úó Cannot: Auto-reorder (manual only)
‚úó Cannot: See other vendors' inventory


PAGE 6: SALES ANALYTICS


‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
‚îÇ                        SALES ANALYTICS                                   ‚îÇ
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


PURPOSE:
Vendor ‡¶§‡¶æ‡¶∞ sales performance ‡¶¨‡ßÅ‡¶ù‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá ‡¶è‡¶¨‡¶Ç data-driven decisions ‡¶®‡¶ø‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá


WHAT VENDOR CAN SEE:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


1. DATE RANGE SELECTOR:
   - Today | Last 7 Days | Last 30 Days | This Month | Last Month | Custom Range
   - Compare with: Previous Period checkbox


2. KEY PERFORMANCE INDICATORS (Top Cards):
    

3. REVENUE CHART:
   - Type: Line or Bar chart
   - X-axis: Days/Weeks/Months (based on date range)
   - Y-axis: Revenue ($)
   - Multiple Lines:
     - Gross Revenue (Total sales)
     - Net Revenue (After commission)
     - Orders Count (Secondary axis)
   - Interactive: Hover to see exact values
   - Download: Export as PNG/PDF


4. SALES BY CATEGORY:
   (Pie/Donut Chart)
   - Shows revenue distribution by product categories
   - Click slice: Filter data by that category
   - Table view option:
     

5. TOP PRODUCTS TABLE:
   - Top 10 products by revenue
        
   - Click product: See detailed analytics for that product


6. SALES TREND:
   - Daily/Weekly/Monthly view
   - Shows: Peak days/hours
   - Best performing day of week
   - Best performing time of day


7. CUSTOMER INSIGHTS:
   - New vs Returning Customers ratio
   - Average Customer Lifetime Value
   - Repeat Purchase Rate
   - Top 5 customers by purchase value


8. PRODUCT PERFORMANCE:
   - Views to Purchase Conversion
   - Products with highest views but low sales (optimization needed)
   - Products with low views but high conversion (promote more)


9. GEOGRAPHIC DISTRIBUTION:
   (If available)
   - Sales by City/State
   - Top 5 locations by revenue
   - Map view (optional)


10. ORDER VALUE ANALYSIS:
    - Average Order Value trend
    - Order value distribution:
      - $0-$50: X orders
      - $51-$100: Y orders
      - $101-$500: Z orders
      - $500+: W orders


11. PAYMENT METHOD ANALYSIS:
    - Which payment methods customers prefer
    - Success rate by payment method


12. REFUND & CANCELLATION RATE:
    - % of orders cancelled
    - % of orders refunded
    - Reasons breakdown (if available)


EXPORT OPTIONS:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
Button: [üì• Export Report]
Formats:
- PDF: Full report with all charts
- Excel: Raw data in spreadsheet
- CSV: Data only


Options:
- Include charts ‚òë
- Include product breakdown ‚òë
- Date range: [Selected range]


WHAT VENDOR CAN DO:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
‚úì ‡¶¶‡ßá‡¶ñ‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Detailed sales analytics
‚úì Select ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Custom date ranges
‚úì Compare ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Different time periods
‚úì Filter ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: By category, product
‚úì View ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Charts and graphs
‚úì Identify ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Best/worst performing products
‚úì Analyze ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Customer behavior
‚úì Export ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Reports (PDF/Excel/CSV)
‚úì Track ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Trends over time
‚úó Cannot: See competitors' data
‚úó Cannot: See platform-wide analytics


ADDITIONAL CRITICAL PAGES


‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
‚îÇ           CATEGORY, ATTRIBUTES & VARIANTS MANAGEMENT                     
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


PAGE 7: CATEGORY MANAGEMENT


‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
‚îÇ                      CATEGORY MANAGEMENT                                 
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


PURPOSE:
Admin-created categories ‡¶¶‡ßá‡¶ñ‡¶æ ‡¶è‡¶¨‡¶Ç vendor ‡¶§‡¶æ‡¶∞ products ‡¶è‡¶∞ ‡¶ú‡¶®‡ßç‡¶Ø appropriate 
category select ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶æ‡•§ New category request ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶æ‡•§


ACCESS LEVEL:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
Vendor Can: View categories, Request new category
Vendor Cannot: Create/Edit/Delete categories directly (admin approval needed)


WHAT VENDOR CAN SEE:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


1. PAGE HEADER:
   - Title: "Product Categories"
   - Total Categories: 45 available
   - Button: [Request New Category]
   - Search: Search categories

   (Hierarchical structure showing parent-child relationships)

      ‚îú‚îÄ üíª Computers (89 products)
      ‚îÇ  ‚îú‚îÄ Laptops (45 products)

   (Click ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶≤‡ßá details panel show ‡¶π‡¶¨‡ßá)

   ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ

4. MY PRODUCTS BY CATEGORY:
   (Shows vendor's product distribution)
   
  
REQUEST NEW CATEGORY:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
Button: [Request New Category]


Modal Opens:
  

Submission:
- Request goes to admin
- Vendor gets notification when approved/rejected
- If approved: Category becomes available for use
- If rejected: Admin provides reason


5. MY CATEGORY REQUESTS:
   (Track ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá pending/approved/rejected requests)
   
   Tab: [Pending (2)] [Approved (5)] [Rejected (1)]
   
     
   Status:
   - üü° Pending: Under admin review
   - ‚úÖ Approved: Available to use
   - ‚ùå Rejected: With reason from admin


6. REJECTED REQUEST DETAILS:
   (Click ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶≤‡ßá rejection reason ‡¶¶‡ßá‡¶ñ‡¶æ ‡¶Ø‡¶æ‡¶¨‡ßá)
   
   Category: Drone Parts
   Requested Date: Feb 8, 2026
   Status: ‚ùå Rejected
   
   Admin's Reason:
   "This category already exists under 'Hobbies > RC Toys > Drones'.
    Please use the existing category structure."
   
   Suggested Alternative: Hobbies > RC Toys > Drones > Parts & Accessories
   
   [Use Suggested Category] [Request Clarification]


WHAT VENDOR CAN DO:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
‚úì ‡¶¶‡ßá‡¶ñ‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: All available categories (hierarchical view)
‚úì Search ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Categories by name
‚úì View ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Category details, requirements
‚úì Filter ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: By parent category
‚úì See ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Own products per category
‚úì Request ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: New categories (goes to admin)
‚úì Track ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Request status (pending/approved/rejected)
‚úì View ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡¶¨‡ßá: Required attributes for each category
‚úó Cannot: Create categories directly
‚úó Cannot: Edit category names/structure
‚úó Cannot: Delete categories
‚úó Cannot: Change category hierarchy
‚úó Cannot: See other vendors' category usage


PAGE 8: ATTRIBUTES MANAGEMENT


‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
‚îÇ                      ATTRIBUTES MANAGEMENT                               ‚îÇ
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


PURPOSE:
Product specifications/properties define ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶æ‡•§ Admin-created global attributes 
use ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶æ ‡¶è‡¶¨‡¶Ç custom attributes request ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶æ‡•§


WHAT ARE ATTRIBUTES?
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
Attributes = Product specifications/properties
Examples:
- Color: Red, Blue, Green
- Size: Small, Medium, Large
- Material: Cotton, Polyester, Silk
- RAM: 4GB, 8GB, 16GB
- Screen Size: 13", 15", 17"


Types:
1. Global Attributes: Admin-created, ‡¶∏‡¶¨ vendors use ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶∞‡ßá
2. Category-Specific: Specific category ‡¶§‡ßá required/optional
3. Custom Attributes: Vendor-specific (request ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶π‡¶¨‡ßá)


WHAT VENDOR CAN SEE:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ


1. PAGE HEADER:
   - Title: "Product Attributes"
   - Available Attributes: 156
   - Button: [Request Custom Attribute]


2. TABS:
   [All Attributes] [Global] [Category-Specific] [My Custom Requests]


3. ATTRIBUTES LIST:
   
   GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES (Available to all):
   ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ
   
   Attribute: Color
   Type: Dropdown
   Used in: 1,234 products (platform-wide)
   Your products using this: 15
   Values: 
   - Red, Blue, Green, Yellow, Black, White, Gray, Pink, 
     Purple, Orange, Brown, Beige [+ 24 more]
   
   [View Details] [Use in Product]
   ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
   
   Attribute: Size
   Type: Dropdown
   Used in: 890 products
   Your products using this: 8
   Values:
   - XS, S, M, L, XL, XXL, XXXL
   
   [View Details] [Use in Product]
   ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ

   Type: Dropdown
   Used in: 567 products
   Your products using this: 3
   Values:
   - Cotton, Polyester, Silk, Wool, Leather, Denim, 
     Nylon, Spandex [+ 15 more]
   
   [View Details] [Use in Product]
   ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
   
   Attribute: Brand
   Type: Text Input
   Used in: 2,345 products
   Your products using this: 22
   Values: Free text entry
